Data on Prime Lending Rates, Mortgage Rates, and Corporate Lending Rates are also provided.

  • Exchange rate:

    Over 200 currencies are included in the database with cross exchange rate data going back to 1590. Included in the database are market exchange rates, official exchange rates, black market exchange rates and forward rates.

  • Government & Debt

    Provides extensive history on debt at the macro level for different countries, with this information broken down into domestic and external debt, government debt and the debt of the economy as a whole. Data on UK Revenues go back to 1168 and data on UK Government Debt goes back to 1691. Government Budget and Debt data for the US go back to 1792.

  • International Trade

    Extensive data on international trade with some data going back to the 1700s for close to 200 countries; includes: Balance of Payments, Exports and Imports, Trade Barriers, Trade Indices.

  • National Accounts

    Provides extensive data, some going back to the 1800s on GDP and its components for over 100 countries. Data on income distribution, such as GINI coefficients is included in this database as well; provided on nominal, real, and per capita GDP, changes in GDP are provided at the aggregate level ,and for many of the sub-categories and sectors of GDP; data on the Value Added provided by different sectors of the economy is provided in detail.

hash.name: International Financial Statistics
hash.title: International Financial Statistics
hash.databasedescription: Contains time series which summarize every available country's balance of payments, with accompanying data on its principle components (trade and reserves) and data on monetary expansion and contraction, government surpluses and deficits, production, prices and interest rates. Generally, annual times series begin in 1948, quarterly and monthly entries in 1957.

hash.name: Datastream
hash.title: Datastream
hash.databasedescription:
Access to the Datastream Advance for Office (AFO) and Charting Excel Add-ins is available through a dedicated workstation in Winspear.


Datastream Help

Datastream training modules http://training.thomsonreuters.com/portal/product.php?pid=8#flr17

Datastream certification
https://training.thomsonreuters.com/portal/product.php?pid=45

Input your name and U of A email address in order to access the tutorials.

Provides historical (20 years) and current data for international equities, indices, bonds, economic series, derivatives, commodities and corporate statistics. Offers access to I/B/E/S consensus earnings. Has very good coverage of emerging markets.

hash.name: Bloomberg Professional
hash.title: Bloomberg Professional
hash.databasedescription:
Available on a dedicated workstation in Winspear.

Current and historical price data, news, indices, charts, and technical indicators on securities, including stocks (equities), bonds, currencies and others.

hash.name: ERIC

meta.more-info: Topic areas include administration, curriculum and instruction in all subject areas, child development, learning and cognition, philosophy and history of education. References to journal articles (those references labelled "EJ" in the accession number field) and microfiche documents (those references labelled "ED" in the accession number field) are included in the two ERIC files

hash.title: ERIC
hash.databasedescription:
ERIC (1966 to the present) covers all aspects of education, from preschool to post-secondary and adult education, and all topics within the broad discipline.
Topic areas include administration, curriculum and instruction in all subject areas, child development, learning and cognition, philosophy and history of education. References to journal articles (those references labelled "EJ" in the accession number field) and microfiche documents (those references labelled "ED" in the accession number field) are included in the two ERIC files

hash.name: Books 24x7: BusinessPro
hash.title: Books 24x7: BusinessPro
hash.databasedescription: BusinessPro offers access to thousands of business titles from reputable publishers and authors in the industry and covers such topical areas as:Sustainability, social media, project management,leadership development.quality management, organizational development, customer relationship management,career advancement, six sigma, time management, corporate case studies, etc.

hash.name: Books 24x7: ITPro
hash.title: Books 24x7: ITPro
hash.databasedescription: Books 24x7 is a collection of reference books from computer publishers. Search, browse and view the full contents of hundreds of books and manuals covering technology topics such as networking, programming languages, desktop applications, the Web and more. Use as a reference resource for technical information by searching specific terms to find answers to technology or application questions.

hash.name: Forrester Research
hash.title: Forrester Research
hash.databasedescription: Forrester Research, a leader of emerging-technology analysis, provides objective research on technology change and its impact on business. Forrester delivers real-world insights from analysts who are in constant contact with business directors, IT experts, marketing specialists, and senior executives across various industries.

hash.name: Amadeus

meta.more-info: The descriptive information includes: official national identification number, address, telephone, fax, website, legal form, year of incorporation, senior managers, auditors, number of employees, quoted/unquoted indicator, industry and activity codes and, when available, a trade description in the local language and English.

hash.title: Amadeus
hash.databasedescription:
Bureau Van Dijk's Amadeus is a pan-European financial database containing information on over 10 million public and private companies from 41 countries, including all the EU countries and Eastern Europe. Up to 10 years of detailed information (consolidated statements are also provided when available) comprising 24 balance sheet items, 25 profit and loss account items and 26 ratios.
The descriptive information includes: official national identification number, address, telephone, fax, website, legal form, year of incorporation, senior managers, auditors, number of employees, quoted/unquoted indicator, industry and activity codes and, when available, a trade description in the local language and English.

hash.name: Compustat North America
hash.title: Compustat North America
hash.databasedescription: Standard & Poor's Compustat is a database of financial, statistical, and marketing information. Compustat provides the annual and quarterly Income Statement, Balance Sheet, Statement of Cash Flows, and supplemental data items on most publicly held companies. Compustat files also contain information on aggregates, industry segments, banks, market prices, dividends, and earnings.

hash.name: EDGAR

meta.more-info:
EDGAR Help

The following tutorial describes how to find annual reports using EDGAR:


  • Public or Private (2 min, 32 sec)

hash.title: EDGAR
hash.databasedescription:
EDGAR, the Electronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system, provides electronic filings (e.g. 10-k, 10-Q, 8k, etc) submitted by public corporations to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission from January 1995 to the present. Documents are posted 24 hours after the date of filing.

EDGAR Help

The following tutorial describes how to find annual reports using EDGAR:


  • Public or Private (2 min, 32 sec)

hash.name: FDIC
hash.title: FDIC
hash.databasedescription: This data set contains historical financial statistics about U.S. commercial banks, savings banks and savings and loans. The file includes details on structure and merger history, financial time series and ratios plus complex derived integers data. The information is from 1984 to 1998.

hash.name: i3 (Cleantech)
hash.title: i3 (Cleantech)
hash.databasedescription: Database of over 18,000 clean technology companies, investors and executives. Provides instant updates on clean technology investments, IPOs, mergers, acquisitions, business relationships, and other financing activity. Clients have full access to the searchable, filterable, and exportable database of cleantech investment data going back to 2005.

hash.name: ISI Emerging Markets
hash.title: ISI Emerging Markets
hash.databasedescription: Information on more than 80 emerging markets including full-text news articles, financial statements, company information, industry analyses, equity quotes, macroeconomic statistics, and market-specific information, derived directly from more than 15,000 local and global publications.

hash.name: ISS (Institutional Shareholder Services): Shareholder Proposal Data
hash.title: ISS (Institutional Shareholder Services): Shareholder Proposal Data
hash.databasedescription: RiskMetrics Shareholder Proposal Data is available from 1997. This includes proposals that came to vote as well as those that did not (e.g because they were withdrawn by the proponent or allowed to be omitted from the proxy by the SEC). Variables include the lead filer of the proposal, the meeting date and outcome; some fields are not complete every year for every company, but vast majority of meeting dates are present. This data set will be updated each year.Access from WRDS.

hash.name: MarketLine Advantage

meta.more-info: Datamonitor 360 also provides in-depth reports on over 50,000 public and private companies.As for country information, the reports contain over five million data points across 215 countries using standard analysis framework - PESTLE. Country reports contain maco-economic, socio-economic and demographic data points using standardized data to allow for easy country comparison. Finally, there are also News, Comment and Analysis feeds allowing users to stay current on business issues.

hash.title: MarketLine Advantage
hash.databasedescription:
MarketLine Advantage (formerly Datamonitor 360) provides industry, company and country information. The reports use standardized data for easy market comparison, market size, segmentation, share and distribution data for 150 consumer products in 55 countries. The unique industry analysis framework is based on Porter's Five Forces and also includes expert future forecast analysis.
Datamonitor 360 also provides in-depth reports on over 50,000 public and private companies.As for country information, the reports contain over five million data points across 215 countries using standard analysis framework - PESTLE. Country reports contain maco-economic, socio-economic and demographic data points using standardized data to allow for easy country comparison. Finally, there are also News, Comment and Analysis feeds allowing users to stay current on business issues.

hash.name: Mergent Online

meta.more-info:
The Mergent Horizon module/ tab allows users to perform industry comparisons and peer-group analyses, evaluate a company's business based on its products and services, and identify its competitors, major customers, suppliers and partners.

Mergent Online Help

The following brief tutorials give information on using Mergent Online:

  • Finding an Industry Report (2 min)
  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • How to Find a US / International Annual Report (2 min, 22 sec)

hash.title: Mergent Online
hash.databasedescription:
Mergent Online provides copies of annual reports and profiles for 11,000 public U.S. and non-U.S. based companies. Profiles include: history, business, property, subsidiaries, officers, directors, long term debt, capital stock, annual income statement and annual balance sheet. Also provides copies of annual reports, links for EDGAR filings, corporate profiles and recent news for U.S.
public companies.

The Mergent Horizon module/ tab allows users to perform industry comparisons and peer-group analyses, evaluate a company's business based on its products and services, and identify its competitors, major customers, suppliers and partners.

Mergent Online Help

The following brief tutorials give information on using Mergent Online:

  • Finding an Industry Report (2 min)
  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • How to Find a US / International Annual Report (2 min, 22 sec)

hash.name: Option Metrics
hash.title: Option Metrics
hash.databasedescription: Source of historical price and implied volatility data for the US/Canadian equity and index options markets. Encompassing data from 1996, Ivy DB contains accurate historical prices of options and their associated underlying instruments, correctly calculated implied volatilities, and option sensitivities. Access via WRDS.

hash.name: Orbis (Bureau van Dijk)

meta.more-info:
As well as descriptive information and the company financials, ORBIS contains further detail such as news, ratings and country reports, scanned reports, ownership and M&A data. You can choose to access the whole of ORBIS or the top 150,000, 750,000, or 4 million companies. The ORBIS database is also available under a simplified interface called MINT GLOBAL

EDGAR Help


The following tutorial describes how to find annual reports using ORBIS:


  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • How to Find a US / International Annual Report (2 min, 22 sec

hash.title: Orbis (Bureau van Dijk)
hash.databasedescription:
ORBIS is a global database which has information on 150 million companies. A major strength is its extensive coverage of private companies.


As well as descriptive information and the company financials, ORBIS contains further detail such as news, ratings and country reports, scanned reports, ownership and M&A data. You can choose to access the whole of ORBIS or the top 150,000, 750,000, or 4 million companies. The ORBIS database is also available under a simplified interface called MINT GLOBAL

EDGAR Help


The following tutorial describes how to find annual reports using ORBIS:


  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • How to Find a US / International Annual Report (2 min, 22 sec

hash.name: Osiris

meta.more-info: The bank financials in OSIRIS offers up to 8 years of financial data for more than 3,350 listed banks. Insurance company financials, collected from annual reports and the NAIC and cover up to 9 years of data on over 660 listed insurance companies. OSIRIS strives to cover all publicly listed companies worldwide. In addition, it covers major non-listed companies when they are primary subsidiaries of publicly listed companies.

hash.title: Osiris
hash.databasedescription:
Bureau Van Dijk's Osiris is a database containing financial information on globally listed public companies, including banks and insurance firms from over 190 countries. The combined industrial company dataset contains standardized and as reported financials, including restated accounts, for up to 20 years on over 55,000 companies.
The bank financials in OSIRIS offers up to 8 years of financial data for more than 3,350 listed banks. Insurance company financials, collected from annual reports and the NAIC and cover up to 9 years of data on over 660 listed insurance companies. OSIRIS strives to cover all publicly listed companies worldwide. In addition, it covers major non-listed companies when they are primary subsidiaries of publicly listed companies.

hash.name: PrivCo: The Private Company Financial Data Authority
hash.title: PrivCo: The Private Company Financial Data Authority
hash.databasedescription: Provides business and financial information on over 500,000 major private companies, including family owned, private equity owned, venture backed, and international unlisted companies. It includes information on finances, mergers and acquisitions, funding activity, ownership structure, and more, as well as data on more than 18,000 private investors and information on over 100,000 private market deals and venture capital fundings.

hash.name: SEDAR

meta.more-info:
Documents are available in one of three formats: Microsoft Word, Corel
WordPerfect, or Adobe Acrobat (PDF).

SEDAR Help

The following are brief tutorials that describe how to find annual reports using SEDAR:

  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • Public or Private (2 min, 32 sec)

hash.title: SEDAR
hash.databasedescription:
SEDAR, the System for Electronic Document Analysis and Retrieval,
provides electronic filings (annual information forms, prospectuses,
proxy/information circulars, materials change reports, interim earnings, press
releases) submitted by public companies and mutual funds to the Canadian
Securities Administrators from January 1997 to the present.

Documents are available in one of three formats: Microsoft Word, Corel
WordPerfect, or Adobe Acrobat (PDF).

SEDAR Help

The following are brief tutorials that describe how to find annual reports using SEDAR:

  • How to Find a Canadian Annual Report (3 min, 43 sec)
  • Public or Private (2 min, 32 sec)

hash.name: Standard & Poor's Net Advantage

meta.more-info:
Standard & Poor's Net Advantage combines the following investor information products:

  • Bond Guide
  • Corporation Records
  • Dividend Record
  • Earnings Guide
  • Industry Surveys
  • Mutual Fund Reports
  • The OUTLOOK (analysis of stock market trends)
  • Register of Corporations, Directors and Executives
  • Security Dealers of North America
  • Stock Guide
  • Stock Reports

hash.title: Standard & Poor's Net Advantage
hash.databasedescription:
See "more" for Standard & Poor's Net Advantage's invest information
Standard & Poor's Net Advantage combines the following investor information products:

  • Bond Guide
  • Corporation Records
  • Dividend Record
  • Earnings Guide
  • Industry Surveys
  • Mutual Fund Reports
  • The OUTLOOK (analysis of stock market trends)
  • Register of Corporations, Directors and Executives
  • Security Dealers of North America
  • Stock Guide
  • Stock Reports

hash.name: Value Line Investment Survey
hash.title: Value Line Investment Survey
hash.databasedescription: Covers 1700 equity issues. The survey contains not only company and performance information but provides a 3 to 5 year probable relative price performance, projections of key financial measures, and concise, objective commentary on current operations and future prospects.

hash.name: Alt HealthWatch
hash.title: Alt HealthWatch
hash.databasedescription: This alternative health database provides full text for more than 140 publications, including full text for many peer-reviewed journals. Provides in-depth coverage across the full spectrum of subject areas covered by complementary and alternative medicine dating back to 1990.

hash.name: Dictionary of Natural Products

meta.more-info:
In addition, a comprehensive type of compound classification scheme brings together compounds that are biogenetically related. All this information is searchable by text or by substructure.

For a fuller description of the content, structure and organisation of the Dictionary of Natural Products click HERE.

hash.title: Dictionary of Natural Products
hash.databasedescription:
The Chapman &Hall/CRC Dictionary of Natural Products is a comprehensive database of 170,000 natural products. Data includes: names and synonyms, formulae, chemical structures, CAS Registry Numbers, extensive source data, uses and applications, physical state, melting point, boiling point, pKa, and key literature citations.


In addition, a comprehensive type of compound classification scheme brings together compounds that are biogenetically related. All this information is searchable by text or by substructure.

For a fuller description of the content, structure and organisation of the Dictionary of Natural Products click HERE.

hash.name: HerbMed®
hash.title: HerbMed®
hash.databasedescription: HerbMed®, a project of the Alternative Medicine Foundation, Inc., is an evidence-based information resource that provides access to the scientific data underlying the use of herbs for health.

hash.name: IN-CAM Outcomes Database
hash.title: IN-CAM Outcomes Database
hash.databasedescription: Database of outcome measures of particular importance to complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) that facilitate and support the assessment of CAM interventions through high quality research, with the goals of making available practical information on a wide range of outcome measures, and of organizing and categorizing outcome measures within a unique framework of outcome domains that integrates measurable domains of health into a unified scheme.

hash.name: Natural Medicines

meta.more-info: All monographs undergo blinded editorial and peer review prior to inclusion in Natural Medicines databases.

hash.title: Natural Medicines
hash.databasedescription:
Natural Medicines provides evidence-based information about complementary and alternative therapies, and includes contributors from more than 50 academic institutions. For each therapy covered by Natural Medicines, a research team systematically gathers scientific data and expert opinions. Validated rating scales are used to evaluate the quality of available evidence. Information is incorporated into comprehensive monographs which are designed to facilitate clinical decision making.
All monographs undergo blinded editorial and peer review prior to inclusion in Natural Medicines databases.

hash.name: MathSciNet
hash.title: MathSciNet
hash.databasedescription:
MathSciNet is the searchable database providing access to over 55 years
of of Mathematical Reviews and Current Mathematical Publicationsfrom 1940 to the present. It provides subject access to journals and conferences publishing in all areas of mathematical sciences, including mathematics, statistics, and computer science as well as mathematically related research in physics, operations research, engineering, biology and other disciplines.

hash.name: Zentralblatt MATH
hash.title: Zentralblatt MATH
hash.databasedescription: Zentralblatt MATH is today the longest-term running abstracting and reviewing service in the field of mathematics. It covers the entire spectrum of mathematics including applications in computer science, mechanics, physics, and others. Citations are classified according to the Mathematics Subject Classification. It contains references to the worldwide literature drawn from currently about 2000 journals and serials, from conference proceedings, collections of papers and books.

hash.name: ACM Digital Library
hash.title: ACM Digital Library
hash.databasedescription: ACM�s Digital Library provides the full-text to ACM journals, magazines, conference proceedings, and e-books, and includes an online archive from 1950s and forward.

hash.name: American Mathematical Society (AMS) Journals
hash.title: American Mathematical Society (AMS) Journals
hash.databasedescription: Nine AMS journals covering articles from 1996 to the present.

hash.name: CiteSeerX

meta.more-info: Rather than creating just another digital library, CiteSeerX provides algorithms, techniques, and software that can be used in other digital libraries. ResearchIndex indexes Postscript and PDF research articles on the Web, and provides the following features: citation indexing, reference linking, related document linking, full-text indexing, and full-text articles.

hash.title: CiteSeerX
hash.databasedescription:
CiteSeerX is a digital library of primarily computing science literature that aims to improve the dissemination and feedback of scientific literature, and to provide improvements in functionality, usability, availability, cost, comprehensiveness, efficiency, and timeliness.
Rather than creating just another digital library, CiteSeerX provides algorithms, techniques, and software that can be used in other digital libraries. ResearchIndex indexes Postscript and PDF research articles on the Web, and provides the following features: citation indexing, reference linking, related document linking, full-text indexing, and full-text articles.

hash.name: CogNet
hash.title: CogNet
hash.databasedescription: CogNet is an electronic community for researchers in cognitive and brain sciences. It includes a searchable, full-text library with a growing collection of books, journals, and reference works such as the MIT Encyclopedia of the Cognitive Sciences.

hash.name: Computing Research Repository
hash.title: Computing Research Repository

hash.name: Computing Reviews
hash.title: Computing Reviews
hash.databasedescription: Computing Reviews provides reviews of journal articles, books, conference proceedings, and other computer science literature. Computing Reviews is a joint effort between Reviews.com, a publisher of reviews of academic and technical literature, and the ACM (Association for Computing Machinery).

hash.name: Lecture Notes in Computer Science
hash.title: Lecture Notes in Computer Science
hash.databasedescription:
Fulltext of electronically published titles from
Springer's Lecture Notes in Computer Science series.

hash.name: Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) Publications
hash.title: Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) Publications
hash.databasedescription: Full-text access to all 11 of SIAM's electronic journals from 1996 to the present

hash.name: DemographicsNow: Library Edition
hash.title: DemographicsNow: Library Edition
hash.databasedescription: DemographicsNow allows analysis of the demographic and market potential of any geography in the U.S.

hash.name: Ipsos News Center
hash.title: Ipsos News Center
hash.databasedescription: Database of all publicly released polling data undertaken by Ipsos Reid, accompanied by detailed data tables with demographic breakdowns.

hash.name: PsycARTICLES
hash.title: PsycARTICLES
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the fulltext of journals published by the American Psychological Association.

hash.name: Richard K. Miller & Associates (RKMA) Market Research Handbooks
hash.title: Richard K. Miller & Associates (RKMA) Market Research Handbooks
hash.databasedescription: Richard K. Miller & Associates (RKMA) market research handbooks focus on various consumer-related markets. Each of these comprehensive assessments includes market forecasts, sector trends, and statistics. In addition to in-depth analyses, handbooks include links to hundreds of websites for additional information.

hash.name: DealScan
hash.title: DealScan
hash.databasedescription: DealScan contains detailed deal terms from March 31, 2010 back to 1988, and selected data back to 1981. It contains extensive and reliable information on the global commercial loan market. It provides users with access to Loan Pricing Corporation's (LPC's) robust database of detailed terms and conditions on over 131,000 loan, high-yield bond and private placement transactions.

hash.name: The Deal Pipeline

meta.more-info: Also includes access to statistics, searchable archives, Bankruptcy League Tables, Bankruptcy League tables (law firms/lawyers, investment banks, crisis management professionals) available back to 2003.

hash.title: The Deal Pipeline
hash.databasedescription:
Provides news about recent deals and a database of transactions including auctions, bankruptcy, venture capital, financing, and mergers and acquisitions. Published by TheDeal.com. Deals can be screened by type, date, industry, size and region. Transactions date back to 1989. Major "real-world" source for hard-to-find information about private companies and middle-market deals.
Also includes access to statistics, searchable archives, Bankruptcy League Tables, Bankruptcy League tables (law firms/lawyers, investment banks, crisis management professionals) available back to 2003.

hash.name: Zephyr
hash.title: Zephyr
hash.databasedescription: Detailed information on financial deals, completed, announced or rumoured, worldwide. Includes approximately new 80,000 deals per year. Has five years of global coverage and includes deals involving European or American companies going back to 1997.Various deal types are covered including: M&A activity, IPOs, joint ventures and private equity deals.

hash.name: Aboriginal People's Survey community profiles, 2001

meta.more-info: These communities include First Nations, Métis settlements, Inuit communities, urban centres and rural areas. Data for Arctic communities are aggregated to the regional level, data for Nisga�a communities are aggregated to the Nisga'a Nation level as are data for communities that are part of the Grand Council of the Crees. Not all First Nations communities could be included in the sample due to operational constraints. As well, some communities chose not to participate. For more background on the 2001 Aboriginal Peoples Survey, see 2001 Aboriginal Peoples Survey: Concepts and Methods Guide.

hash.title: Aboriginal People's Survey community profiles, 2001
hash.databasedescription:
Contains free information on the adult Aboriginal identity population for selected communities in Canada where the Aboriginal identity population is 200 or more according to the 2001 Census.
These communities include First Nations, Métis settlements, Inuit communities, urban centres and rural areas. Data for Arctic communities are aggregated to the regional level, data for Nisga�a communities are aggregated to the Nisga'a Nation level as are data for communities that are part of the Grand Council of the Crees. Not all First Nations communities could be included in the sample due to operational constraints. As well, some communities chose not to participate. For more background on the 2001 Aboriginal Peoples Survey, see 2001 Aboriginal Peoples Survey: Concepts and Methods Guide.

hash.name: Inter-Corporate Ownership Database

meta.more-info: ICO information is based on non-confidential returns filed by Canadian corporations under the Corporations Returns Act and through research using public sources such as internet sites. The entries for each corporation provide both the country of control and the country of residence. ICO covers every individual corporation that is part of a group of commonly controlled corporations with combined assets exceeding 200 million dollars or combined revenue exceeding 80 million dollars. Individual corporations with debt obligations or equity owing to non-residents exceeding a net book value of 1 million dollars are also covered.

hash.title: Inter-Corporate Ownership Database
hash.databasedescription:
Inter-corporate Ownership is a unique directory of "who owns what" in Canada. Corporate control is determined through analysis of holdings by corporations, the effects of options, insider holdings, and convertible shares and interlocking directorships, making up a hierarchy structure totaling approximately 40,000 entries.
ICO information is based on non-confidential returns filed by Canadian corporations under the Corporations Returns Act and through research using public sources such as internet sites. The entries for each corporation provide both the country of control and the country of residence. ICO covers every individual corporation that is part of a group of commonly controlled corporations with combined assets exceeding 200 million dollars or combined revenue exceeding 80 million dollars. Individual corporations with debt obligations or equity owing to non-residents exceeding a net book value of 1 million dollars are also covered.

hash.name: Thomson Reuters Insider Data

meta.more-info:
SEC Forms Used to Compile Insider Information:
  • Form 3 - Initial statement which identifies holdings of registrant's securities owned by directors, officers, and 10% shareholders. A Form 3 must be filed within 10 days after the event.
  • Form 4 - Amendment to Form 3 reporting a sale or acquisition of registrant's securities. A Form 4 must be filed by the tenth say of the month following the month in which the transaction occurred.
  • Form 5 - Annual section 16 filing filed 45 days after the company's fiscal year end.
  • Form 144 - A form filed as notice of the proposed sale of restricted securities, or securities held by an affiliate of the issuer in reliance on Rule 144 when the amount to be sold during any three-month period exceeds 500 shares or has an aggregate sales price in excess of $10,000.

Please note: Thomson Reuters Ownership data (formerly called Spectrum) is not a clean set of data. This is mostly due to reporting inconsistencies with the SEC documents from which the data is pulled. Also, this is a database of transactions (buying and selling of stock) so it is meant to be a record of changes in position, not a snapshot by quarter.

hash.title: Thomson Reuters Insider Data
hash.databasedescription:
Thomson Reuters Insider Data is the most extensive (back to 1978) collection of insider trading data as reported on SEC Forms 3, 4, 5, and 144. It covers equity and convertible trades by individuals and institutions that are classified by the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as "insiders." An insider is an officer, director, a person with a "policy-making" role, or a beneficial owner (holder of 10% or more) of a company's stock.
SEC Forms Used to Compile Insider Information:

  • Form 3 - Initial statement which identifies holdings of registrant's securities owned by directors, officers, and 10% shareholders. A Form 3 must be filed within 10 days after the event.
  • Form 4 - Amendment to Form 3 reporting a sale or acquisition of registrant's securities. A Form 4 must be filed by the tenth say of the month following the month in which the transaction occurred.
  • Form 5 - Annual section 16 filing filed 45 days after the company's fiscal year end.
  • Form 144 - A form filed as notice of the proposed sale of restricted securities, or securities held by an affiliate of the issuer in reliance on Rule 144 when the amount to be sold during any three-month period exceeds 500 shares or has an aggregate sales price in excess of $10,000.

Please note: Thomson Reuters Ownership data (formerly called Spectrum) is not a clean set of data. This is mostly due to reporting inconsistencies with the SEC documents from which the data is pulled. Also, this is a database of transactions (buying and selling of stock) so it is meant to be a record of changes in position, not a snapshot by quarter.

hash.name: Thomson Reuters Institutional 13f Holdings
hash.title: Thomson Reuters Institutional 13f Holdings
hash.databasedescription: Provides Institutional Common Stock Holdings and Transactions, as reported oForm 13F filed with the SEC.

hash.name: AtoZ World Business
hash.title: AtoZ World Business
hash.databasedescription: Information for doing business with 100 countries; includes business culture, logistics/transportation, marketing, money, exporting/importing, etc.

hash.name: CountryData
hash.title: CountryData
hash.databasedescription: Contains International Country Risk Guide (ICRG) Ratings as well as domestic and international economic indicators for 150 countries going back to 1984. Also includes current Coplin O-Leary PRS Forecast for each country. All data downloadable as a CSV file.

hash.name: CountryWatch.com
hash.title: CountryWatch.com
hash.databasedescription: Information and news on the countries of the world and for the public and private sector organizations with global operations and interests

hash.name: Doing Business Law Library
hash.title: Doing Business Law Library
hash.databasedescription: The Doing Business Law Library is a compilation of laws from almost every World Bank member jurisdiction and is the largest free online collection of business laws and regulations. They link to official government sources wherever possible. The collection is updated regularly and can be searched by type of law or by jurisdiction.

hash.name: IMD World Competitiveness Online
hash.title: IMD World Competitiveness Online
hash.databasedescription: Online version of The World Competitiveness Yearbook (WCY), an annual report on the competitiveness of nations, ranking and analyzing how a nation�s environment creates and sustains the competitiveness of enterprises.

hash.name: OECD iLibrary

meta.more-info:
OECD iLibrary is a portal to the fulltext of all OECD periodicals and books, including statistical publications and country studies, published from 1998 to the present. It also includes OECD statistical databases that you can use to build your own tables. Some databases provide data as far back as 1960.


For pre-1998 OECD publications, search for the book or periodical title in the Library Catalogue.


The OECD is the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development. The OECD publishes and collects statistics on a wide range of social and economic issues, including agriculture, competition, corruption, education, employment, energy, globalisation, health, international migration, sustainable development, trade, technology, transport, etc.
OECD iLibrary is a portal to the fulltext of all OECD periodicals and books, including statistical publications and country studies, published from 1998 to the present. It also includes OECD statistical databases that you can use to build your own tables. Some databases provide data as far back as 1960.


For pre-1998 OECD publications, search for the book or periodical title in the Library Catalogue.

hash.databasedescription:

For pre-1998 OECD publications, search for the book or periodical title in the Library Catalogue.

For pre-1998 OECD publications, search for the book or periodical title in the Library Catalogue.

hash.name: UNData

meta.more-info: It incorporates and replaces the United Nations Commons Database (UNCDB) and includes over 60 million data points covering a wide range of themes including Agriculture, Crime, Education, Employment, Energy, Environment, Health, HIV/AIDS, Human Development, Industry, Information and Communication Technology, National Accounts, Population, Refugees, Tourism, Trade, as well as the Millennium Development Goals indicators.

hash.title: UNData
hash.databasedescription:
UNData provides access to multiple statistical databases developed by various organizations affiliated with the United Nations System.
It incorporates and replaces the United Nations Commons Database (UNCDB) and includes over 60 million data points covering a wide range of themes including Agriculture, Crime, Education, Employment, Energy, Environment, Health, HIV/AIDS, Human Development, Industry, Information and Communication Technology, National Accounts, Population, Refugees, Tourism, Trade, as well as the Millennium Development Goals indicators.

hash.name: World Trade Organization Statistics Database
hash.title: World Trade Organization Statistics Database
hash.databasedescription:
This database provides Trade Profiles of WTO members and observers. It also allows you to build tables using statistics going back to 1980 on:

  • Merchandise trade by commodity
  • Merchandise trade indices
  • Network of world merchandise trade
  • Regional integration arrangements
  • Total merchandise trade
  • Trade in commercial services

hash.name: International Debt Statistics
hash.title: International Debt Statistics
hash.databasedescription: Contains statistical data for countries that report public and publicly-guaranteed debt to the World Bank Debtor Reporting System.

hash.name: Alberta Education Authorized Resources Databases
hash.title: Alberta Education Authorized Resources Databases
hash.databasedescription: Database of Alberta authorized resources in support of the Kindergarten to Grade 12 curriculum.

hash.name: Canadian Poetry
hash.title: Canadian Poetry
hash.databasedescription: Created in partnership with the Electronic Text Centre at the University of New Brunswick Libraries. Contains the full text of more than 12,000 poems by 142 poets including Bliss Carman, Isabella Valancy Crawford and Archibald Lampman, and will soon offer a comprehensive survey of Canadian poetry from the seventeenth century to the early twentieth. Includes overviews of the lives and works of featured authors.

hash.name: Canadian Reference Centre
hash.title: Canadian Reference Centre
hash.databasedescription: Includes Canadian magazines, newspapers, newswires and reference books. This database includes leading Canadian periodicals and international (U.S. and U.K) periodicals in full text; full text reference books; full text biographies and an Image Collection. Updated daily.

hash.name: CBCA Education

meta.more-info:
Includes bilingualism and language acquisition, counselling, curriculum, educational administration,
educational technology, special education, teacher education, and other topics. Indexing is provided to over 150 Canadian education periodicals plus education articles in over 700 Canadian journals and newspapers. Fulltext is provided for articles from approximately 50 core education journals, as well as for selected education articles from over 700 Canadian journals and newspapers.

Education

Education - Adult
Education - Elementary
Education - Psychology
Education - Secondary

Educational Administration & Leadership
Health Education

Psychologie

TESL - Teaching English as a Second Language

hash.title: CBCA Education
hash.databasedescription:
CBCA Fulltext Education (1977 to the present) covers all aspects of education,
teaching and learning from preschool to higher education.
Includes bilingualism and language acquisition, counselling, curriculum, educational administration,
educational technology, special education, teacher education, and other topics. Indexing is provided to over 150 Canadian education periodicals plus education articles in over 700 Canadian journals and newspapers. Fulltext is provided for articles from approximately 50 core education journals, as well as for selected education articles from over 700 Canadian journals and newspapers.

hash.name: Children's Literature Comprehensive Database
hash.title: Children's Literature Comprehensive Database
hash.databasedescription: Indexes children's books, and includes selected reviews.

hash.name: Curio.ca
hash.title: Curio.ca
hash.databasedescription: Access to educational streaming video and audio from CBC and Radio-Canada. Includes documentaries from television and radio, news reports, archival material, stock shots, and other content.

hash.name: Digital Commons Network

subject.subject: Curriculum and Instruction (K-12)
Education - Adult
Special Education
TESL - Teaching English as a Second Language

hash.title: Digital Commons Network
hash.databasedescription: Database of open access scholarly articles from BePress Digital Commons.

hash.name: EdITLib Digital Library for Information Technology and Education
hash.title: EdITLib Digital Library for Information Technology and Education
hash.databasedescription: Includes fulltext of journals and conference proceedings published by the AACE (Association for the Advancement of Computing in Education).

hash.name: Encyclopaedia Britannica Online
hash.title: Encyclopaedia Britannica Online
hash.databasedescription: Online edition of the Encyclopedia Britannica.

hash.name: Fiction Core Collection

meta.more-info: Fiction Core Collection provides entries for individual novels and analytic entries for novellas and novels contained in composite works. You will find more than 8,000 titles listed, with entries providing complete bibliographic data, price, descriptive annotations, and evaluative quotations from a review when available. Use the information for collection development and maintenance, readers' advisory, and general reference.

hash.title: Fiction Core Collection
hash.databasedescription:
The selective list presented in Fiction Core Collection features classic and contemporary works of fiction recommended for a general adult audience, written in or translated into English. The best authors and their most widely read works in literary and popular fiction, old and new, are listed, including mysteries, science fiction, fantasy, Westerns, and romance.
Fiction Core Collection provides entries for individual novels and analytic entries for novellas and novels contained in composite works. You will find more than 8,000 titles listed, with entries providing complete bibliographic data, price, descriptive annotations, and evaluative quotations from a review when available. Use the information for collection development and maintenance, readers' advisory, and general reference.

hash.name: Graphic Novels Core Collection
hash.title: Graphic Novels Core Collection
hash.databasedescription: Lists recommended graphic novel titles with descriptive and evaluative annotations (including review excerpts and awards the title has won), plus cover art. Standards for rating material by age appropriateness are strictly applied, plus all titles are searchable by author, title, subject, genre, and grade level.

hash.name: Indigenous Peoples: North America
hash.title: Indigenous Peoples: North America
hash.databasedescription: Includes sources from collections from across Canadian and American institutions. Provides insight into the cultural, political and social history of Native Peoples from the seventeenth into the twentieth century. Including diverse manuscripts; book collections; newspapers from various tribe and Indian-related organizations; materials such as Bibles, dictionaries and primers in Indigenous languages all enable students' examination of important primary source materials.

hash.name: Infobase Learning
hash.title: Infobase Learning
hash.databasedescription: Streaming video and related educational material for schools.

hash.name: JoVE Science Education Database
hash.title: JoVE Science Education Database
hash.databasedescription: Databases of videos for teaching laboratory fundamentals from JoVE, the Journal of Visualized Experiments.

hash.name: Kraus Curriculum Development Library
hash.title: Kraus Curriculum Development Library
hash.databasedescription: Provides an entry point to thousands of curriculum documents drawn over a period of approximately 20 years from school districts, state education agencies, government agencies as well as professional and national organizations.

hash.name: Literature Criticism Online
hash.title: Literature Criticism Online
hash.databasedescription:
Literature Criticism Online brings together 10 literary series from Gale Publishing:





  • Children's Literature Review
  • Classical and Medieval Literature Criticism
  • Contemporary Literary Criticism
  • Drama Criticism
  • Literature Criticism from 1400-1800
  • Nineteenth-Century Literature Criticism
  • Poetry Criticism
  • Shakespearean Criticism
  • Short Story Criticism
  • Twentieth-Century Literary Criticism

hash.name: Merlot: Multimedia Educational Resource for Learning and Online Teaching
hash.title: Merlot: Multimedia Educational Resource for Learning and Online Teaching
hash.databasedescription: MERLOT is a free and open resource designed primarily for faculty and students of higher education. Links to online learning materials are collected here along with annotations such as peer reviews and assignments.

hash.name: National Geographic Virtual Library
hash.title: National Geographic Virtual Library
hash.databasedescription: National Geographic magazine 1888-1994.

hash.name: NFB CAMPUS (National Film Board of Canada)
hash.title: NFB CAMPUS (National Film Board of Canada)
hash.databasedescription: Streaming video from the National Film Board of Canada.

hash.name: OER Commons
hash.title: OER Commons
hash.databasedescription: Create, share and discover Open Education Resources (OERs) for teaching and learning in K-12 and higher education.

hash.name: Online Reference Centre (LearnAlberta)

meta.more-info:
LearnAlberta's Online Reference Centre includes multimedia encyclopedias, pictures, newspapers, and many other reference resources
including:

  • Electric Library Plus and Electric Library Elementary
    • pictures, maps, newspapers and newswires, reference books, works of
      literature, magazines and transcripts of TV and radio shows
    • substantial Canadian content
    • World Book Encyclopedia and Canadian
      Encyclopedia      , Gage Canadian Dictionary

  • SIRS Discoverer

    • information in 15 subject areas, including: Arts, Cultures, Drugs &
      Alcohol, Environment, Fiction, Health & Human Body, History & U.S.
      Government, Notable People, Personal Growth, Science, Social Issues, Sports and
      Technology
    • reference materials and web links

  • Grolier Online

    • six encyclopedias: New Book of Knowledge, Grolier
      Multimedia Encyclopedia      , Encyclopedia Americana,
      Encyclopedia of Popular Science, Nueva enciclopedia Cumbre
      en línea       (Spanish), Encyclopedia of Lands and Peoples
    • magazine articles, pictures, video, maps (political, thematic, historical,
      etc.), career links, dictionaries, thesauri and a current events database, web
      links

  • The Canadian Encyclopedia

    • a wide range of information about Canada and the world in both English and
      French
