hash.name: Canada's Awards Database
hash.title: Canada's Awards Database
hash.databasedescription: Search Canadian television and cinema award winners by a Person's Name, Title and/or Year, Category and Year, Category and Show Number, and Show Number.

hash.name: Canadian Feature Film Database
hash.title: Canadian Feature Film Database
hash.databasedescription: The Canadian Feature Film Database is based on the printed Index (Canadian Feature Film Index) begun in 1972. The Database based on the Index compiles the principal credits of every Canadian feature film from 1913 to 2006 and establishes a list of Canadian feature films from published information up to 2006.

hash.name: ERA: Education & Research Archive

meta.more-info: For more information on ERA, please see http://guides.library.ualberta.ca/era.

hash.title: ERA: Education & Research Archive
hash.databasedescription:
ERA, or the Education and Research Archive of the University of Alberta, holds material related to the teaching or research activities at the University of Alberta and associated items representing intellectual production. ERA's content policy encourages and accepts research material, items associated with teaching, and any data or documentation that helps to provide context for understanding the primary deposited item.
For more information on ERA, please see http://guides.library.ualberta.ca/era.

hash.name: Essay and General Literature Index
hash.title: Essay and General Literature Index
hash.databasedescription: Indexes essays contained in anthologies and collections. Coverage spans the humanities and social sciences, with subject coverage ranging from economics, political science, and history to criticism of literary works, art history, drama, and film.

hash.name: Europa Film Treasures

meta.more-info: The site will be regularly expanded by new contributions: films, documents, interviews, programs; and in a few weeks, all the information and film selection will be available in five languages.

hash.title: Europa Film Treasures
hash.databasedescription:
The videos are via streaming, and cannot be downloaded. All genres and time periods are represented in the database and freely accessible! From comedy to science fiction, from westerns to animation, from erotic to ethnological movies, Europa Film Treasures dives into the moving heritage of European cultural and political history, through each film archive working on preserving their movies.
The site will be regularly expanded by new contributions: films, documents, interviews, programs; and in a few weeks, all the information and film selection will be available in five languages.

hash.name: Film Indexes Online

meta.more-info:
Film Index International gives fully international coverage of films and film personalities from over 170 countries. All eras of film-making are covered - from the early silent movies to recent box-office hits. Based on the bfi's Summary of Information on Film and Television (SIFT) database, Film Index International is both inclusive and authoritative.

AFI Catalog from the AFI provides a detailed view of American feature films produced during the last century. Includes full production and cast information as well as extensive plot summaries and notes.

hash.title: Film Indexes Online
hash.databasedescription:
Film Indexes Online covers two products from the British Film Institute (bfi) and the American Film Institute (AFI): Film Index International and AFI Catalog .


Film Index International gives fully international coverage of films and film personalities from over 170 countries. All eras of film-making are covered - from the early silent movies to recent box-office hits. Based on the bfi's Summary of Information on Film and Television (SIFT) database, Film Index International is both inclusive and authoritative.

AFI Catalog from the AFI provides a detailed view of American feature films produced during the last century. Includes full production and cast information as well as extensive plot summaries and notes.

hash.name: Film Literature Index
hash.title: Film Literature Index
hash.databasedescription: The Film Literature Index (FLI) annually indexes 150 film and television periodicals from 30 countries cover-to-cover and 200 other periodicals selectively for articles on film and television. The periodicals range from the scholarly to the popular. This online version contains approximately 700,000 citations to articles, film reviews and book reviews published between 1976-2001. As 2005, there are no plans to update this online resource.

hash.name: Filmakers Library Online
hash.title: Filmakers Library Online
hash.databasedescription: Provides documentaries on a number of subjects, including race and gender studies, human rights, globalization and global studies, multiculturalism, international relations, criminal justice, the environment, bioethics, health, political science and current events, psychology, arts, literature, and more. It presents points of view and historical and current experiences from diverse cultures and traditions world-wide.

hash.name: Naxos Music Library
hash.title: Naxos Music Library
hash.databasedescription: Naxos Music Library provides streaming audio the complete Naxos, Marco Polo and Da Capo catalogues as well as Jazz and World music, educational products and a growing range of Historical recordings featuring the biggest performers in the history of classical music. The catalogues of other independent labels will be added to the library in due course.

hash.name: The Complete Index to World Film Since 1895

meta.more-info: Basically, CITWF is a first stop reference tool. In seconds, from a Simple Search, you get the film details and references to published material. You may also use the Advanced Search and build a query across several fields.

hash.title: The Complete Index to World Film Since 1895
hash.databasedescription:
Contains information on over thousands of films produced in most countries of the world since 1888. Also contains references to books and journals and virtually all of these publications are held in our library. CITWF is based on published materials and not on information sent in by the public. It has provenance.
Basically, CITWF is a first stop reference tool. In seconds, from a Simple Search, you get the film details and references to published material. You may also use the Advanced Search and build a query across several fields.

hash.name: Criterion-on-Demand
hash.title: Criterion-on-Demand
hash.databasedescription: Criterion-on-Demand is a video streaming service, providing access to a large number of videos for educational purposes.

hash.name: Indigenous Collection
hash.title: Indigenous Collection
hash.databasedescription: Covers topical and historical issues within Indigenous studies, and includes material from Australia, Indonesia, Malaysia, New Zealand, North America and The Pacific.

hash.name: 2006 Aboriginal Population Profile

meta.more-info: The Aboriginal identity population comprises those persons who reported identifying with at least one Aboriginal group, that is, North American Indian, Métis or Inuit, and/or those who reported being a Treaty Indian or a Registered Indian, as defined by the Indian Act of Canada, and/or those who reported they were members of an Indian band or First Nation.

hash.title: 2006 Aboriginal Population Profile
hash.databasedescription:
The Aboriginal Population Profile is the presentation of various 2006 data for the Aboriginal identity population in Canadian communities. Data are available for areas where the Aboriginal identity population count is 250 or more.
The Aboriginal identity population comprises those persons who reported identifying with at least one Aboriginal group, that is, North American Indian, Métis or Inuit, and/or those who reported being a Treaty Indian or a Registered Indian, as defined by the Indian Act of Canada, and/or those who reported they were members of an Indian band or First Nation.

hash.name: American Indian Histories and Cultures
hash.title: American Indian Histories and Cultures
hash.databasedescription: Includes materials from the Edward E. Ayer Collection, an archival collection of American Indian history and culture, at the Newberry Library in Chicago.

hash.name: Archives Canada
hash.title: Archives Canada
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the holdings of archival institutions across Canada. Includes descriptions of the holdings of over 800 participating institutions. Also includes links to virtual archival exhibits.

hash.name: ArcticStat Circumpolar Database
hash.title: ArcticStat Circumpolar Database
hash.databasedescription: ArcticStat is a permanent, public and independent statistical database dealing with the countries, regions and populations of the Circumpolar Arctic.

hash.name: Human Rights Documents
hash.title: Human Rights Documents
hash.databasedescription: Human Rights Documents Online (HRDO) contains documents on international human rights issues collected by the Human Rights Internet (HRI) in Ottawa in Canada since 1980. This collection of "grey literature" from small and large organizations working globally and locally, the collection is updated on an annual basis.

hash.name: In the First Person: An Index to Letters, Diaries, Oral Histories and Personal Narratives
hash.title: In the First Person: An Index to Letters, Diaries, Oral Histories and Personal Narratives
hash.databasedescription: Indexes collections of oral history in English from around the world. With future releases, the index will broaden to identify other first-person content, including letters, diaries, memoirs, and autobiographies, and other personal narratives. Beginning with the next release, it will also identify first-person content within the various Alexander Street databases, becoming the single-search tool for locating this content with all Alexander Street collections.

hash.name: Native American Archives

meta.more-info: Also included are the Ratified Indian Treaties (dating back to 1722), which were made by the Continental Congress, the Congress of the Confederation, and under the Constitution. In addition, the archive contains Indian Census Rolls (featuring personal information including age, place of residence and degree of Indian blood), The Guion Miller Rolls, and the Dawes Packets (containing original applications for tribal enrollments).

hash.title: Native American Archives
hash.databasedescription:
The Native American Archives collection includes original historical documents pertaining to Native American history and life from the 18th through the 20th century made possible in collaboration with the National Archives and Allen County Library.
Also included are the Ratified Indian Treaties (dating back to 1722), which were made by the Continental Congress, the Congress of the Confederation, and under the Constitution. In addition, the archive contains Indian Census Rolls (featuring personal information including age, place of residence and degree of Indian blood), The Guion Miller Rolls, and the Dawes Packets (containing original applications for tribal enrollments).

hash.name: Profile of Edmonton Neighbourhoods, 2006
hash.title: Profile of Edmonton Neighbourhoods, 2006
hash.databasedescription: 2006 Canadian Census of Population statistics by Edmonton named-neighbourhood from "Alberta Avenue" to "Weir Industrial".

hash.name: Social Work Abstracts
hash.title: Social Work Abstracts
hash.databasedescription: Social Work Abstracts contains information on the fields of social work and human services from March 1966 to present. The database provides coverage of all areas of the profession, including theory and practice, areas of service, social issues, and social problems.

hash.name: SocINDEX with Full Text
hash.title: SocINDEX with Full Text
hash.databasedescription: Indexes the literature of sociology and related disciplines. Includes full text for selected journals, monographs, conference papers.

hash.name: The Métis National Council Historical Online Database

meta.more-info: Importantly, genealogists and Métis users of this website are able to construct Métis family trees using the documents in the database. Providing Métis users with access to their ancestors’ documents facilitates the process of cultural re-connection, identity reclamation, and nation building. The data and digital images for the Métis National Council Historic Online Database was provided by the Métis Archival Project (MAP) research team at the Faculty of Native Studies, University of Alberta.

hash.title: The Métis National Council Historical Online Database
hash.databasedescription:
Contains textual information extracted from archival documents relevant to the historical Métis Nation. Also contains high-resolution digital photography and scans of many of the original documents represented in the database. The MNC Historical Online Database allows users to access Métis related archival information,previously only available at Library and Archives Canada (Ottawa) or on microfilm.
Importantly, genealogists and Métis users of this website are able to construct Métis family trees using the documents in the database. Providing Métis users with access to their ancestors’ documents facilitates the process of cultural re-connection, identity reclamation, and nation building. The data and digital images for the Métis National Council Historic Online Database was provided by the Métis Archival Project (MAP) research team at the Faculty of Native Studies, University of Alberta.

hash.name: Dokusfera: Elektronnyi fond Russkoi Natsional'noi Biblioteki (RNB)
hash.title: Dokusfera: Elektronnyi fond Russkoi Natsional'noi Biblioteki (RNB)
hash.databasedescription: Dokusfera (Docusphere) provides access to digitized collections of the Russian National Library. The list of collections is provided here.

hash.name: Bibliography on Cold Regions Science and Technology

meta.more-info: The Bibliography on Cold Regions Science and Technology is funded in part by the National Science Foundation and the U. S. Army Cold Regions Research and Engineering Laboratory.

hash.title: Bibliography on Cold Regions Science and Technology
hash.databasedescription:
The Bibliography on Cold Regions Science and Technology includes references to scientific and engineering research related to material and operations in a winter battlefield, the nature and impact of cold on facilities and activities, cold-related environmental problems, and the impact of human activity on cold environments.


The Bibliography on Cold Regions Science and Technology is funded in part by the National Science Foundation and the U. S. Army Cold Regions Research and Engineering Laboratory.

hash.name: African Index Medicus
hash.title: African Index Medicus
hash.databasedescription: Index to articles, books, reports and studies from international development agencies, nongovernmental organizations and local institutions, published in Africa, on health and biomedical topics, and not covered in other indexes.

hash.name: Articles de presse: BPI-doc références

meta.more-info: La base actuelle est constituée de tous les articles sélectionnés sur ces sujets depuis le 1er janvier 1997. Avant cette date, vous pourrez trouver dans la base des articles sur des personnalités du monde des arts, de la littérature et des spectacles, conservés par Public Info depuis 1978.

hash.title: Articles de presse: BPI-doc références
hash.databasedescription:
Cette base de données est réalisée par le service Public Info. Elle contient des articles sur l’actualité culturelle et sociale internationale issus du dépouillement sélectif d’une centaine de journaux français.
La base actuelle est constituée de tous les articles sélectionnés sur ces sujets depuis le 1er janvier 1997. Avant cette date, vous pourrez trouver dans la base des articles sur des personnalités du monde des arts, de la littérature et des spectacles, conservés par Public Info depuis 1978.

hash.name: Banque de données Santé Publique (B.D.S.P.)

meta.more-info: La centralisation des données, collectées et analysées par les documentalistes dans leurs propres centres, permet une approche diversifiée et pluridisciplinaire de l'information en santé publique. La mise à jour des données de la base est assurée par l'AED. Chaque mois, 2000 nouvelles références en moyenne sont ajoutées à la base documentaire. Le fonctionnement de ce réseau documentaire repose sur une collaboration volontaire et une coordination étroite entre les partenaires.

hash.title: Banque de données Santé Publique (B.D.S.P.)
hash.databasedescription:
La base documentaire de la BDSP couvre l'information scientifique et technique produite en France et à l'étranger depuis 1978. Elle a été conçue pour répondre aux besoins de tous les acteurs de santé : décideurs, chercheurs, professions médicales et paramédicales, cadres hospitaliers, responsables de santé, acteurs sociaux, professionnels de l'information.
La centralisation des données, collectées et analysées par les documentalistes dans leurs propres centres, permet une approche diversifiée et pluridisciplinaire de l'information en santé publique. La mise à jour des données de la base est assurée par l'AED. Chaque mois, 2000 nouvelles références en moyenne sont ajoutées à la base documentaire. Le fonctionnement de ce réseau documentaire repose sur une collaboration volontaire et une coordination étroite entre les partenaires.

hash.name: Base De Données Lexicographiques Panfrancophone
hash.title: Base De Données Lexicographiques Panfrancophone
hash.databasedescription: L’objectif de la base est de constituer et de regrouper des bases représentatives du français de chacun des pays et de chacune des régions de la francophonie. Les bases de données sont conçues de façon à pouvoir être consultées sur Internet et à servir de complément au Trésor de la langue française informatisé

hash.name: Base de Français Médiéval (BFM)
hash.title: Base de Français Médiéval (BFM)
hash.databasedescription: The Base de Français Médiéval database (or BFM) currently comprises seventy-five complete Old and Middle French texts (approx. 3 300 000 words). The database allows the creation of sub-corpora and the statistical analysis of the data.

hash.name: BasePacte: engagements internationaux de la France
hash.title: BasePacte: engagements internationaux de la France
hash.databasedescription: L’objectif de la base est de constituer et de regrouper des bases représentatives du français de chacun des pays et de chacune des régions de la francophonie. Les bases de données sont conçues de façon à pouvoir être consultées sur Internet et à servir de complément au Trésor de la langue française informatisé.

hash.name: Bibliographie de Belgique
hash.title: Bibliographie de Belgique
hash.databasedescription: The Bibliographie de Belgique provides access to monthly lists of bibliographic information concerning all works published in Belgium. Interfaces are available in French and Dutch.

hash.name: Bibliographie du Québec
hash.title: Bibliographie du Québec
hash.databasedescription: These monthy classified lists provide bibliographical references to publications issued in Quebec since 2003. beginning with all ASTM standards published in the 2007 Annual Book set. Subsequent additions to the db will include any redlined and superceded standards from 2007 onwards."

hash.name: Bibliographie nationale française
hash.title: Bibliographie nationale française
hash.databasedescription: Provides browseable online access to the Bibliographie national française, which includes bibliographic information for all books, serials, music, audio-visual materials, and maps issued in France since 2001.

hash.name: Bibliographie nationale luxembourgeoise
hash.title: Bibliographie nationale luxembourgeoise
hash.databasedescription:
Provides access to Bibliographies nationales (Luxembourg) which include the annual issues of:



  • Bibliographie luxemburgoise, the current national bibliography of Luxembourg
  • Bibliography d'histoire luxemburgoise, the retrospective national bibliography with focus on history


Coverage is from 2001 to the present.

hash.name: Bibliography of Africana Periodical Literature Database
hash.title: Bibliography of Africana Periodical Literature Database
hash.databasedescription: Indexes English language and multi-lingual journals and periodicals that specialize in African Studies or consistently cover the African continent.

hash.name: Bibliography of Linguistic Literature
hash.title: Bibliography of Linguistic Literature
hash.databasedescription: Contains literature from all over the world on general linguistics and its neighboring disciplines such as psycholinguistics, philosophy of language, semiotics, as well as on English, German, and Romance linguistics

hash.name: Bibliography of Metaphor & Metonymy
hash.title: Bibliography of Metaphor & Metonymy
hash.databasedescription: Contains literature from all over the world on general linguistics and its neighboring disciplines such as psycholinguistics, philosophy of language, semiotics, as well as on English, German, and Romance linguistics

hash.name: Bibliography of Pragmatics

meta.more-info: It covers topics from traditions that belong or have contributed to pragmatics in substantial ways (from accommodation theory, analytical philosophy and anthropological linguistics, to cognitive linguistics, construction grammar, conversation analysis, discourse analysis, literary pragmatics, neurolinguistics, psycholinguistics, relevance theory, sociolinguistics, speech act theory, and universal and transcendental pragmatics, to name just a few). Published electronically, it is a flexible research instrument which, in the initial phase, combines the data from the older -- printed -- bibliography (up to 1985) with publications from the period 1993-2002. Annual updates will then gradually bridge the remaining gap while providing the relevant new data.

hash.title: Bibliography of Pragmatics
hash.databasedescription:
The Bibliography of Pragmatics Online is an annotated bibliography of the field of linguistic pragmatics, conceived as the interdisciplinary (cognitive, social, and cultural) science of natural language use.
It covers topics from traditions that belong or have contributed to pragmatics in substantial ways (from accommodation theory, analytical philosophy and anthropological linguistics, to cognitive linguistics, construction grammar, conversation analysis, discourse analysis, literary pragmatics, neurolinguistics, psycholinguistics, relevance theory, sociolinguistics, speech act theory, and universal and transcendental pragmatics, to name just a few). Published electronically, it is a flexible research instrument which, in the initial phase, combines the data from the older -- printed -- bibliography (up to 1985) with publications from the period 1993-2002. Annual updates will then gradually bridge the remaining gap while providing the relevant new data.

hash.name: Biography In Context
hash.title: Biography In Context
hash.databasedescription: Contains biographies from Gale Group sources with related full-text articles from hundreds of periodicals, as well as tens of thousands of images and links to hand-picked web sites. Search for people---both current and historic from all eras and fields of endeavor---based on name, occupation, nationality, ethnicity, birth/death dates and places, or gender, as well as keyword and full text.

hash.name: Biography Index: Past and Present

meta.more-info: Also indexes 2,000 current books of individual and collective biography each year, as well as biographical material in otherwise non-biographical books. Cites biographies and autobiographies, as well as interviews, obituaries, collections of letters, diaries, memoirs, juvenile literature, book reviews, bibliographies and exhibition reviews. People covered range from antiquity to the present and represent all fields and nationalities.

hash.title: Biography Index: Past and Present
hash.databasedescription:
Biography Index cites articles with significant biographical content appearing in any of the more than 3,000 periodicals indexed in other Wilson databases, plus select other titles.
Also indexes 2,000 current books of individual and collective biography each year, as well as biographical material in otherwise non-biographical books. Cites biographies and autobiographies, as well as interviews, obituaries, collections of letters, diaries, memoirs, juvenile literature, book reviews, bibliographies and exhibition reviews. People covered range from antiquity to the present and represent all fields and nationalities.

hash.name: BITRA: Bibliography of Interpreting and Translation
hash.title: BITRA: Bibliography of Interpreting and Translation
hash.databasedescription: This site comprises more than 41,000 entries (books, chapters, articles, journals, Ph.D. dissertations), with about 12,000 abstracts, more than 20,000 citations in the Impact field, and more than 1,500 tables of contents, making up a database on translation and interpreting. You can search by subject, author, publisher, language, etc. and can access abstracts and/or the table of contents of many documents.

hash.name: BP16 : Bibliographie des éditionsBibliothèque nationale de France - Gallica : la bibliothèque numérique parisiennes du 16e siècle
hash.title: BP16 : Bibliographie des éditionsBibliothèque nationale de France - Gallica : la bibliothèque numérique parisiennes du 16e siècle
hash.databasedescription: This site contains initially 10 000 records of five volumes of chronological inventory of 16th century Parisian editions, printed between 1972 and 2004, covering the years 1501 to 1540, prepared for the first four by Brigitte Moreau (1930 - 1994). The years 1541 - 1550 are upcoming.

hash.name: Catalogue des fonds culturels numérisés
hash.title: Catalogue des fonds culturels numérisés
hash.databasedescription: Locates, identifies, and describes textual, iconographic, audio, audio-visual, etc. collections that have been or are being digitized by libraries, archives, museums, and other institutions throughout France.

hash.name: Cumulative Index to a Selected List of Periodicals (1896-1899)
hash.title: Cumulative Index to a Selected List of Periodicals (1896-1899)
hash.databasedescription: General index to 19th century periodical literature.

hash.name: Dictionary of Canadian Biography
hash.title: Dictionary of Canadian Biography
hash.databasedescription: The Web version of the Dictionary of Canadian Biography/ Dictionaire biographique du Canada (DCB/DBC) is a shared collaboration between the University of Toronto, Université Laval, the Department of Canadian Heritage and Library and Archives Canada.

hash.name: Dictionnaire des auteurs de langue française en Amérique du Nord
hash.title: Dictionnaire des auteurs de langue française en Amérique du Nord
hash.databasedescription: Le Dictionnaire des auteurs de langue française en Amérique du Nord contient près de 1600 notices. Chaque notice est composée de renseignements biographiques, souvent étayés de citations, d'une bibliographie des oeuvres de l'auteur (livres, brochures et un choix d'articles) et d'un choix d'études critiques. L'ouvrage propose également une liste d'instruments de travail fort pertinente.

hash.name: Dictionnaire des oeuvres littéraires du Québec
hash.title: Dictionnaire des oeuvres littéraires du Québec
hash.databasedescription: Outil de référence incontournable des études en littérature québécoise, le Dictionnaire des ?uvres littéraires du Québec (DOLQ) a pour mandat de recenser, dans un souci d'exhaustivité, la production littéraire québécoise des origines à nos jours.

hash.name: Ebooks libres & gratuits
hash.title: Ebooks libres & gratuits
hash.databasedescription: Vous trouverez sur ce site tous les ebooks publiés par le groupe Yahoo Ebooks libres et gratuits, ainsi que les ebooks publiés par leurs partenaires. Les ebooks du groupe vous sont proposés en 3 formats : Mobipocket Reader, eReader ou PalmReader et Acrobat Reader. Vous trouverez tous les détails et liens de téléchargement sur leur page logiciels.

hash.name: Electronic Enlightenment
hash.title: Electronic Enlightenment
hash.databasedescription: Electronic Enlightenment offers access to the web of correspondence between the greatest thinkers and writers of the 18th century and their families and friends, bankers and booksellers, patrons and publishers.

hash.name: European Research Papers Archive (ERPA)

meta.more-info: Languages: Primarily English; also French, German

hash.title: European Research Papers Archive (ERPA)
hash.databasedescription:
Database of online working papers about European integration from: Robert Schuman Centre , Academy of European Law at the European University Institute (Florence), Max Planck Institute for the Study of Societies (Cologne), Jean Monnet Working Papers - Harvard Law School, European Integration online Papers (European Communities Studies Association Austria), Advanced Research on Europeanisation of the Nation-State (Oslo) ,Manheim Centre for European Social Research.


Languages: Primarily English; also French, German

hash.name: EVIA Digital Archive
hash.title: EVIA Digital Archive
hash.databasedescription: Ethnographic Video for Instruction & Analysis (EVIA) is a digital archive of ethnographic field video specializing in the fields of ethnomusicology, folklore, anthropology, and dance ethnology. Collections in the EVIA Digital Archive Project represent a diverse range of performance traditions from around the world.

hash.name: French Political Pamphlets
hash.title: French Political Pamphlets
hash.databasedescription: A collection of French Political Pamphlets in the L. Tom Perry Special Collections (LTPSC) at Brigham Young University features more than 2,400 pamphlets published between 1547 and 1626.

hash.name: HAL (Hyper Article on Line)
hash.title: HAL (Hyper Article on Line)
hash.databasedescription: HAL - Hyper Article Online is a French Open Access archive into which all disciplines and all institutions and universities are invited to deposit all their research. HAL is a tool for direct scientific communication between researchers. Documents deposited in HAL are not subjected to any peer evaluation; but they should, however, be of sufficient quality to rate submission for publication in a specialized scientific journal.

hash.name: Harmatheque.com
hash.title: Harmatheque.com
hash.databasedescription: Collection of french language e-books.

hash.name: I-Revues
hash.title: I-Revues
hash.databasedescription: I-Revues is the access point to electronic publications (journals, conference proceedings, books or documentary) from any scientific field. Publications are searchable alphabetically or by scientific discipline or by Publisher from the menu "Publications".

hash.name: île en île: un site pour valoriser les ressources informatives et culturelles du monde insulaire francophone
hash.title: île en île: un site pour valoriser les ressources informatives et culturelles du monde insulaire francophone
hash.databasedescription: Les informations du site sont organisées en cinq régions: Océan Atlantique, Caraïbes et Antilles, Méditerranée, Océan Indien et Océan Pacifique; et, pour chaque île et région de focalisation, au sein de quatre rubriques: 1) Culture: arts culinaires, arts plastiques, cinéma, danse, langage, littérature, musique, théâtre -- 2) Voyages: voyages et tourisme, cartes -- 3) Patrimoine: croyances et traditions, faune et flore, généalogie, géographie, histoire, monuments, numismatique, philatélie -- 4) Annuaires: annuaires, associations et îliens, enseignement, institutions et gouvernement, presse écrite, radio et télevision, ressources documentaires et culturelles.

hash.name: IRIS: La bibliothèque en Histoire des Sciences
hash.title: IRIS: La bibliothèque en Histoire des Sciences
hash.databasedescription: IRIS c'est une bibliothèque numérique en histoire des sciences et épistémologie au service de la recherche et de la valorisation du patrimoine scientifique régional.

hash.name: Isidore
hash.title: Isidore
hash.databasedescription: Database of open access data in the humanities and social sciences.

hash.name: Klapp-Online
hash.title: Klapp-Online
hash.databasedescription: "Klapp-Online" is the online annotated version of the "Klapp", bibliography of French literature or Bibliographie der französischen Literaturwissenschaft. All years from 1991 have been electronically catalogued and are available for consultation.

hash.name: La Base de Données CRITER

meta.more-info: This terminological database gives access to the entire vocabulary published by the Commission générale de terminologie et de néologie in France's Journal Officiel. It contains definitions and translations, as well as geographical variations and synonyms.

hash.title: La Base de Données CRITER
hash.databasedescription:
La base de données terminologiques du dispositif d'enrichissement de la langue française qu'est le Corpus du Réseau Interministériel de Terminologie (CRITER) permet de consulter les listes terminologiques publiées par la Commission générale de terminologie et de connaître pour chaque terme, français ou étranger, recherché, son équivalent.


This terminological database gives access to the entire vocabulary published by the Commission générale de terminologie et de néologie in France's Journal Officiel. It contains definitions and translations, as well as geographical variations and synonyms.

hash.name: La Base de Données toponymiques du Canada

meta.more-info: Cette base de données est gérée par le logiciel ORACLE sous un système d'exploitation SOLARIS exploité par Ressources naturelles Canada. C'est la principale source d'information nationale à consulter pour connaître les appellations officielles aux fins de l'élaboration des cartes, de la production des répertoires toponymiques, de la navigation sur le Web et de l'utilisation des autres systèmes numériques à référence spatiale. Capable de contenir plus de 30 attributs pour un même nom, la base de données est mise à jour quotidiennement.

hash.title: La Base de Données toponymiques du Canada
hash.databasedescription:
Résumé La base de données toponymiques du Canada (BDTC) contient quelques 500 000 entrées, dont plus des deux tiers se rapportent à des toponymes (noms de lieux et d'entités géographiques) officiels et approuvés par le Comité permanent canadien des noms géographiques (CPCNG).
Cette base de données est gérée par le logiciel ORACLE sous un système d'exploitation SOLARIS exploité par Ressources naturelles Canada. C'est la principale source d'information nationale à consulter pour connaître les appellations officielles aux fins de l'élaboration des cartes, de la production des répertoires toponymiques, de la navigation sur le Web et de l'utilisation des autres systèmes numériques à référence spatiale. Capable de contenir plus de 30 attributs pour un même nom, la base de données est mise à jour quotidiennement.

hash.name: Le Grand Robert en ligne

meta.more-info:
Le dictionnaire en ligne du Grand Robert contient:
  • tous les renvois analogiques, contraires, dérivés et composés, homonymes (en gras dans le texte);
  • tous les renvois de citations (généralement précédés d'une flèche, par exemple - aventure, cit. 6), permettant d'accéder directement à la citation concernée sans changer de contexte;
  • tous les auteurs de citations, qui sont reliés d'une part à un dictionnaire des auteurs constitué de 2000 notices issues du Petit Robert des noms propres (édition 2004), et d'autre part à la bibliographie générale du Grand Robert. On peut ainsi accéder, à partir de n'importe laquelle des 325 000 citations du dictionnaire, à des notices biographiques et bibliographiques pour tous les auteurs et références.
  • un index inédit de toutes les expressions, locutions et proverbes du Grand Robert

et permet


  • de multiples modes de visualisation des articles
  • la conjugaison intégrale des 11 000 verbes du Grand Robert
  • de puissantes recherches textuelles.

hash.title: Le Grand Robert en ligne
hash.databasedescription:
Cette nouvelle version électronique du Grand Robert contient l'intégralité de la dernière édition du Grand Robert de la langue française, parue en 2001 en six volumes.
Le dictionnaire en ligne du Grand Robert contient:

  • tous les renvois analogiques, contraires, dérivés et composés, homonymes (en gras dans le texte);
  • tous les renvois de citations (généralement précédés d'une flèche, par exemple - aventure, cit. 6), permettant d'accéder directement à la citation concernée sans changer de contexte;
  • tous les auteurs de citations, qui sont reliés d'une part à un dictionnaire des auteurs constitué de 2000 notices issues du Petit Robert des noms propres (édition 2004), et d'autre part à la bibliographie générale du Grand Robert. On peut ainsi accéder, à partir de n'importe laquelle des 325 000 citations du dictionnaire, à des notices biographiques et bibliographiques pour tous les auteurs et références.
  • un index inédit de toutes les expressions, locutions et proverbes du Grand Robert

et permet


  • de multiples modes de visualisation des articles
  • la conjugaison intégrale des 11 000 verbes du Grand Robert
  • de puissantes recherches textuelles.

hash.name: Le Nouveau Petit Robert de la langue française

meta.more-info:
Le dictionnaire en ligne du Petit Robert contient:
  • la prononciation enregistrée de plus de 16 000 mots difficiles, pour éviter les erreurs à l'oral;
  • un correcteur d'orthographe basé sur la phonétique, pour détecter les erreurs ou proposer les homonymes possibles;
  • 60 000 mots, accompagnés de leur transcription phonétique et de leur étymologie;

toutes les conjugaisons, les féminins, les pluriels, soit
  • 470 000 formes fléchies, pour retrouver un mot à partir de n'importe laquelle de ses formes ou pour afficher les tableaux de conjugaison des 6 500 verbes du Nouveau Petit Robert, à tous les modes et à tous les temps.

hash.title: Le Nouveau Petit Robert de la langue française
hash.databasedescription:
Cette nouvelle version électronique du Petit Robert contient l'intégralité de l’édition 2008 du Nouveau Petit Robert de la langue française, ainsi que des enrichissements spécifiques à la version en ligne.
Le dictionnaire en ligne du Petit Robert contient:
  • la prononciation enregistrée de plus de 16 000 mots difficiles, pour éviter les erreurs à l'oral;
  • un correcteur d'orthographe basé sur la phonétique, pour détecter les erreurs ou proposer les homonymes possibles;
  • 60 000 mots, accompagnés de leur transcription phonétique et de leur étymologie;

toutes les conjugaisons, les féminins, les pluriels, soit
  • 470 000 formes fléchies, pour retrouver un mot à partir de n'importe laquelle de ses formes ou pour afficher les tableaux de conjugaison des 6 500 verbes du Nouveau Petit Robert, à tous les modes et à tous les temps.

hash.name: Legifrance: le service public de la diffusion du droit
hash.title: Legifrance: le service public de la diffusion du droit
hash.databasedescription:
LEGISinfo provides information on legislation currently before Parliament. This tool provides electronic access to a wide range of information about individual bills, such as:



  • the text of the bill at various stages
  • government press releases and backgrounders (for government bills)
  • legislative summaries from the Parliamentary Research Branch
  • important speeches from the House of Commons and Senate debates (Hansards) at second reading
  • Parliamentary committee proceedings and reports concerning each bill
  • votes
  • coming into force data


LEGISInfo also provides: a reading list, and other related Web links for House of Commons and Senate government bills.



LEGISInfo currently covers bills and their related documents going back to January 2001 (37th Parliament, 1st session). Retrospective coverage will be added in the future.




LEGISInfo est un outil de recherche indispensable pour trouver de l'information sur les projets de loi examinés par le Parlement. Cet outil donne accès par voie électronique à de nombreux renseignements sur chaque projet de loi, notamment:


  • le texte du projet de loi aux diverses étapes
  • le communiqué de presse et le document d'information du gouvernement (pour les projets de loi d'initiative gouvernementale);
  • le résumé législatif de la Direction de la recherche parlementaire
  • les interventions importantes à l'étape de la deuxième lecture, et les rapports des comités parlementaires
  • les votes
  • l'entrée en vigueur


De plus, offre une liste de lectures recommandées et d'autres liens Internet relatifs aux projets de loi émanant du gouvernement et déposés à la Chambre des communes ou au Sénat. En regroupant ces sources, facilite l'accès à l'information et réduit le temps consacré à la recherche sur les projets de loi.

hash.name: Liberation Journals Index

meta.more-info: This index was originally conceived both as a public research tool and as a practical component of Meadow Dibble-Dieng’s dissertation, a comparative study that considers the various ways in which literary periodicals have served in liberation movements throughout the Francophone world. Index Coverage dates: La Revue du Monde Noir - 1931-1932 Légitime Défense - 1932 L’Étudiant Noir - 1935 Tropiques - 1941-1945 Présence Africaine - 1947-1959 Liberté - 1959-1960, 1970.

hash.title: Liberation Journals Index
hash.databasedescription:
The Liberation Journals Index is an analytic, searchable, online index covering the interwar Pan-African periodicals La Revue du Monde Noir, Légitime Défense, L’Étudiant Noir, the wartime Tropiques, and the postwar Présence Africaine, as well as the Québécois journal Liberté.
This index was originally conceived both as a public research tool and as a practical component of Meadow Dibble-Dieng’s dissertation, a comparative study that considers the various ways in which literary periodicals have served in liberation movements throughout the Francophone world. Index Coverage dates: La Revue du Monde Noir - 1931-1932 Légitime Défense - 1932 L’Étudiant Noir - 1935 Tropiques - 1941-1945 Présence Africaine - 1947-1959 Liberté - 1959-1960, 1970.

hash.name: LIMAG: Littératures du Maghreb
hash.title: LIMAG: Littératures du Maghreb
hash.databasedescription: Maghreb Literature (Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia): articles, dissertations, books, and films.

hash.name: Linguistic Data Consortium
hash.title: Linguistic Data Consortium
hash.databasedescription: The University of Alberta is an institutional member of the Linguistic Data Consortium (LDC). Access is available to all language corpora in the LCD Catalog from 2006 forward.

hash.name: Litfinder
hash.title: Litfinder
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the full text of a variety of literature including poems, stories, and plays. Also includes additional information sources such as biographies, essays and explanations.

hash.name: Manybooks.net
hash.title: Manybooks.net
hash.databasedescription: This site provides access to thousands of books in e-format. Visitors can read online or download works for their PDAs (compatible with all platforms and PDA devices or an iPod). The titles range from the colonialist adventures of the King of the Khyber Rifles to Julius Caesar.

hash.name: Mediterranean Memory
hash.title: Mediterranean Memory
hash.databasedescription: Includes radio and television archives from countries around the Mediterranean along with notes on the material in English, French, and Arabic.

hash.name: Memento
hash.title: Memento
hash.databasedescription: Memento est une base de données du domaine du livre et de l'édition francophone. Fruit de la mise en commun de l'expertise des sociétés Electre (France) et BTLF (Québec), elle comprend des renseignements bibliographiques sur près d'un million de titres en français. La recherche peut s'effectuer selon plusieurs critères, dont le titre, l'auteur, l'éditeur, l'ISBN, la collection, le sujet, la date de parution, le prix, et bien d'autres. La base de données est mise à jour quotidiennement.

hash.name: National Union Catalog of Manuscript Collections (NUCMC)
hash.title: National Union Catalog of Manuscript Collections (NUCMC)
hash.databasedescription: Contains close to 500,000 records available in the Research Libraries Information Network bibliographic database, for archival and manuscript collections in research libraries, museums, state archives and historical societies located throughout North America and around the world.

hash.name: New World Cinema: Independent Features and Shorts, 1990-Present
hash.title: New World Cinema: Independent Features and Shorts, 1990-Present
hash.databasedescription: The collection includes approximately 200 full-length feature films from leading independent distributors.

hash.name: Nos Racines: Les Histoires Locales du Canada en Ligne

meta.more-info:
Les étudiants et le grand public peuvent dès maintenant découvrir cette richesse en ligne grâce au World Wide Web (WWW) au moyen d'une interface favorisant une recherche rapide par l'interrogation de mots clés, dates, titres, auteurs et texte intégral. Près de 1000 documents en français sont inscrits dans la banque qui s'enrichit toujours.

Les utilisateurs vont découvrir différents événements et personnages qui ont façonné l'histoire des régions et de leurs localités. On y retrouve des sujets aussi variés que: la construction navale à Moncton, le passage des Irlandais à Grosse Île, l'invasion américaine de 1775 au Bas-Canada, la Bataille des Plaines d'Abraham de 1759, les postes de traite de fourrure (Tadoussac), l'Association canadienne anti-esclavagiste baptiste, les revendications des autochtones, la ruée vers l'or au Klondike et les contributions de Monseigneur de Laval.

Grâce au site Nos Racines, il est maintenant possible d'avoir accès à des sources primaires et secondaires uniques sur le patrimoine culturel et social du pays. La numérisation de ces documents en permet la préservation et l'accessibilité par un outil de recherche facile à consulter pour les générations à venir. Les élèves, les généalogistes, les écrivains, les chercheurs universitaires du monde entier et le grand public peuvent dès à présent profiter de ce matériel, autrefois difficile à consulter, de partout dans le monde, en tous temps.

hash.title: Nos Racines: Les Histoires Locales du Canada en Ligne
hash.databasedescription:
Le site Nos Racines permet une redécouverte de l'histoire du Canada par ses localités et ses régions. Ces histoires locales ont été écrites par la communauté, pour la communauté et représentent l'histoire du Canada telle que racontée par son peuple.
Les étudiants et le grand public peuvent dès maintenant découvrir cette richesse en ligne grâce au World Wide Web (WWW) au moyen d'une interface favorisant une recherche rapide par l'interrogation de mots clés, dates, titres, auteurs et texte intégral. Près de 1000 documents en français sont inscrits dans la banque qui s'enrichit toujours.

Les utilisateurs vont découvrir différents événements et personnages qui ont façonné l'histoire des régions et de leurs localités. On y retrouve des sujets aussi variés que: la construction navale à Moncton, le passage des Irlandais à Grosse Île, l'invasion américaine de 1775 au Bas-Canada, la Bataille des Plaines d'Abraham de 1759, les postes de traite de fourrure (Tadoussac), l'Association canadienne anti-esclavagiste baptiste, les revendications des autochtones, la ruée vers l'or au Klondike et les contributions de Monseigneur de Laval.

Grâce au site Nos Racines, il est maintenant possible d'avoir accès à des sources primaires et secondaires uniques sur le patrimoine culturel et social du pays. La numérisation de ces documents en permet la préservation et l'accessibilité par un outil de recherche facile à consulter pour les générations à venir. Les élèves, les généalogistes, les écrivains, les chercheurs universitaires du monde entier et le grand public peuvent dès à présent profiter de ce matériel, autrefois difficile à consulter, de partout dans le monde, en tous temps.

hash.name: OpenSIGLE : System for Information on Grey Literature in Europe
hash.title: OpenSIGLE : System for Information on Grey Literature in Europe
hash.databasedescription: Bibliographical references of reports and other grey literature produced in Europe until 2005, including technical or research reports, doctoral dissertations, some conference papers, some official publications, and other types of grey literature. OpenSIGLE covers pure and applied science and technology, economics, other sciences and humanities.

hash.name: Oxford Journals
hash.title: Oxford Journals
hash.databasedescription: Contains fulltext of journals published by Oxford University Press. While access to most OUP online journals is included, access to some OUP journals is excluded due to contractual agreements between OUP and the learned societies for which OUP publishes the journal.

hash.name: Persée
hash.title: Persée
hash.databasedescription: Portail de revues scientifiques en sciences humaines et sociales. Elle a pour vocation la numérisation et la mise en ligne des collections restrospectives de ce vaste corpus.

hash.name: PHILIDOR
hash.title: PHILIDOR
hash.databasedescription: This is a database of resources relating to French 17 and 18th century music. There are 3 parts to the database: PHILIDOR-Bibliographie indexes books, articles, and theses published since the 1800; PHILIDOR-Oeuvres gives access to author and music type catalogs, and Cahiers-PHILIDOR presents, in pdf format, research work based on the Philidor tools.

hash.name: Poezibao

meta.more-info:
Poezibao est à la fois:
  • une anthologie permanente avec un extrait de poésie publié chaque jour
  • un journal permanent de l'actualité de la poésie (évènements, parutions, salons, lectures, etc)
  • un magazine avec des reportages, des rencontres et des fiches de lectures
  • une revue littéraire (qui sollicite et reçoit des textes inédits et des contributions de divers auteurs)
  • une recension régulière des revues de poésie • enfin une base de données qui se constitue au fur et à mesure de l'enrichissement du site

hash.title: Poezibao
hash.databasedescription:
Le nom Il s’agit d’un mot-valise né de la fusion de Poésie et de Dazibao (journaux que les chinois placardent sur les murs) Le contenu Poezibao.com est une revue électronique entièrement dédiée à la poésie (essentiellement moderne et contemporaine) et actualisée en permanence (au moins quotidiennement, souvent plusieurs fois par jour, 7/7 jours)
Poezibao est à la fois:

  • une anthologie permanente avec un extrait de poésie publié chaque jour
  • un journal permanent de l'actualité de la poésie (évènements, parutions, salons, lectures, etc)
  • un magazine avec des reportages, des rencontres et des fiches de lectures
  • une revue littéraire (qui sollicite et reçoit des textes inédits et des contributions de divers auteurs)
  • une recension régulière des revues de poésie • enfin une base de données qui se constitue au fur et à mesure de l'enrichissement du site

hash.name: Presse lyonnaise du XIXe siècle
hash.title: Presse lyonnaise du XIXe siècle
hash.databasedescription: More than 200 searchable digitized Lyon region newspapers from 1830 to 1914.

hash.name: RISM Series A / II: Music Manuscripts after 1600
hash.title: RISM Series A / II: Music Manuscripts after 1600
hash.databasedescription: RISM Series A / II: Music Manuscripts after 1600 is an international, non-profit joint venture which aims to comprehensively document the world's musical sources of manuscripts or printed music, works on music theory and libretti stored in libraries, archives, monasteries, schools and private collections. The organization, founded in Paris in 1952, is the largest and the only global operation that registers written musical sources. RISM documents what exists and where it is stored.

hash.name: Romans@lire
hash.title: Romans@lire
hash.databasedescription: Pour trouver un roman ou un recueil de nouvelles, parmi les œuvres écrites ou traduites en français depuis 2000 et parmi l’ensemble de la littérature québécoise. La recherche dans la banque peut être effectuée à partir de multiples facettes, Sujet, genre de roman, type de personnage, et autres.

hash.name: Sign@l : Signalement des contenus de périodiques en sciences humaines et sociales
hash.title: Sign@l : Signalement des contenus de périodiques en sciences humaines et sociales
hash.databasedescription: Sign@l offers articles from French periodicals in humanities and social sciences. Some articles are open access. This database complements CAIRN and Persée.

hash.name: Toponymie du Canada
hash.title: Toponymie du Canada
hash.databasedescription: La Base de données toponymiques du Canada (BDTC) est la banque de données des noms géographiques qui fait autorité au Canada. Elle est gérée par la Section des noms géographiques du Centre d'information topographique, à Géomatique Canada, Ressources naturelles Canada. Elle vise à emmagasiner les noms qui ont été approuvés par le Comité permanent canadien des noms géographiques (CPCNG) et à diffuser ces données qui font autorité aux utilisateurs du gouvernement et du public.

hash.name: Translation Studies Bibliography
hash.title: Translation Studies Bibliography
hash.databasedescription: The Translation Studies Bibliography online covers research in translation and interpretation studies. Included are books, articles in journals and books and book reviews from 1994.

hash.name: United Nations Multilingual Terminology Database

meta.more-info: It should be understood that the material on this site is not comprehensive or complete. The inclusion of an item in this database - which is simply a linguistic tool - should not be construed as an endorsement by the United Nations of any particular position, entity or programme.

hash.title: United Nations Multilingual Terminology Database
hash.databasedescription:
This database was compiled over the years in response to diverse and wide-ranging demands of United Nations language staff for terminology and nomenclature. It is being put on the Internet to facilitate the efforts of people around the world who participate in the work of the United Nations but do not have access to the Secretariat's intranet.
It should be understood that the material on this site is not comprehensive or complete. The inclusion of an item in this database - which is simply a linguistic tool - should not be construed as an endorsement by the United Nations of any particular position, entity or programme.

hash.name: UNTERM Portal
hash.title: UNTERM Portal
hash.databasedescription: UNTERM provides terminology and nomenclature in subjects relevant to the work of the United Nations. Information is provided in the six UN official languages, and there are also entries in German and Portuguese.

hash.name: Usito
hash.title: Usito
hash.databasedescription: Usito is a North-American French language dictionary with linguistic data on standard French, as well as regional terminology from across Canada and elsewhere.

hash.name: American Geophysical Union Earth and Space Index (EASI)
hash.title: American Geophysical Union Earth and Space Index (EASI)
hash.databasedescription: Search across all of the periodicals published on behalf of the AGU within the Wiley Online Library.

hash.name: David Rumsey Collection
hash.title: David Rumsey Collection
hash.databasedescription: The David Rumsey Collection focuses on 18th and 19th century North and South American cartographic materials. The collection includes atlases, globes, school geographies, maritime charts, and a variety of separate maps including pocket, wall, children's and manuscript maps. The online collection is an expanding cross section of images designed to highlight the depth and breadth of the collection. The digital images and associated descriptive data are © Cartography Associates.

hash.name: EffectiveOlderPeopleCare.org
hash.title: EffectiveOlderPeopleCare.org
hash.databasedescription: EffectiveOlderPeopleCare.org is a continually updated source of current best evidence from Cochrane systematic reviews which relate to the health care of older people. It focuses on common health problems in old age and different models of service organisation for older people. Disease specific topics are at present excluded. It provides a concise account of the evidence.

hash.name: Austrian Literature Online (ALO)
hash.title: Austrian Literature Online (ALO)
hash.databasedescription: ALO is a digital library with documents from the 11th Century up to the present. Books, journals, newspapers, manuscripts, theses and scientific essays are available in digitized form or as eprint.

hash.name: Austrian Newspapers Online ANNO : historische österreichische Zeitungen und Zeitschriften online
hash.title: Austrian Newspapers Online ANNO : historische österreichische Zeitungen und Zeitschriften online
hash.databasedescription: A portal to historical journals, periodicals, and newspapers published in the Habsburg monarchy and Austria.

hash.name: DaSinD (Datenbank der Schriftstellerinnen in Deutschland)
hash.title: DaSinD (Datenbank der Schriftstellerinnen in Deutschland)
hash.databasedescription: The Database of Women Writers in Germany provides biographical and bibliographical information about over 15,000 women authors and translators from 1945 to the present.

hash.name: Germanistik Online
hash.title: Germanistik Online
hash.databasedescription: Germanistik Online (1960 to the present) focuses on German language, literature, linguistics, and philology. It also covers other Germanic languages and literatures. Some citations include abstracts.

hash.name: Historische Volltexte - Österreichische Nationalbibliothek
hash.title: Historische Volltexte - Österreichische Nationalbibliothek
hash.databasedescription: The Austrian National Library provides free access to 140,000 digitized books and over 200,000 periodicals published between 1501 and 1870. The default search mode is set to full-text searching of all these publications.

hash.name: KLGonline
hash.title: KLGonline
hash.databasedescription: KLGOnline, the online version of Das Kritische Lexikon zur deutschsprachigen Gegenwartsliteratur (KLG) is a bio-bibliography of contemporary German literature. It includes biographical essays and bibliographies of the works published by the authors as well as works published about them. This continuously updated biographical lexicon covers about 650 authors who write in German.

hash.name: Linguistic Bibliography Online
hash.title: Linguistic Bibliography Online
hash.databasedescription: Provides bibliographical references to scholarly publications in linguistics. The online edition contains all entries of the printed volumes as of 1993 and new records are added on a monthly basis.

hash.name: Datenbank-Paket Duden
hash.title: Datenbank-Paket Duden
hash.databasedescription: Online collection of German language reference works of the publishing house Duden.

hash.name: VLB-Public (Verzeichnis Lieferbarer Bücher)
hash.title: VLB-Public (Verzeichnis Lieferbarer Bücher)
hash.databasedescription: This database is the searchable online version of the German books in print catalogue Verzeichnis Lieferbarer Bücher.

hash.name: Österreichische Bibliographie, die OeB-online

meta.more-info:
• Reihe A, Verzeichnis der österreichischen Neuerscheinungen
  • Reihe B, Verzeichnis der österreichischen Hochschulschriften
  • Reihe C, Neuere ausländische Austriaca

OeB-online allows for browsing and searching of the entire contents of Reihe A from 2003 to the present, as well as viewing its annual supplements Sonderheft Karten and Sonderheft Musica practica. For searching Reihe B and Reihe C, OeB-online links to the Austrian union catalogue called Österreichische Verbundkatalog; relevant records can be retrieved by limiting the searches with the codes OeBB and OeBC, respectively.

hash.title: Österreichische Bibliographie, die OeB-online
hash.databasedescription:
OeB-online is the current Austrian national bibliography. It includes publications from Austria and publications about Austria or by Austrians from elsewhere in the world. All three parts of the Österreichische Nationalbibliographie are accessible:



  • Reihe A, Verzeichnis der österreichischen Neuerscheinungen
  • Reihe B, Verzeichnis der österreichischen Hochschulschriften
  • Reihe C, Neuere ausländische Austriaca

OeB-online allows for browsing and searching of the entire contents of Reihe A from 2003 to the present, as well as viewing its annual supplements Sonderheft Karten and Sonderheft Musica practica. For searching Reihe B and Reihe C, OeB-online links to the Austrian union catalogue called Österreichische Verbundkatalog; relevant records can be retrieved by limiting the searches with the codes OeBB and OeBC, respectively.

hash.name: Österreichische Dissertationsdatenbank
hash.title: Österreichische Dissertationsdatenbank
hash.databasedescription: Österreichische Dissertationsdatenbank (Austrian Database of Dissertations) is an index to over 40,000 doctoral theses submitted at universities in Austria from 1990 to the present. Abstracts in German or English are present for over 30,000 titles.

hash.name: AEIOU Österreich-Lexikon
hash.title: AEIOU Österreich-Lexikon
hash.databasedescription: Online lexicon of Austria based on the original print publication "Österreich-Lexikon" (1995).

hash.name: Brockhaus Wissensservice
hash.title: Brockhaus Wissensservice
hash.databasedescription: Online version of the 21st edition of the Brockhaus Encyclopaedia. Includes updates to articles published in print. Also includes multimedia files: art reproductions, photographs, and other image files; music and other sound recordings, audio books, readings of literary texts, maps, and other multimedia.

hash.name: Dansk bogfortegnelse og Dansk periodicafortegnelse
hash.title: Dansk bogfortegnelse og Dansk periodicafortegnelse
hash.databasedescription:
Provides access to the weekly issues of the Danish national bibliography from 2003 to the present in two series:




  • Dansk bogfortegnelse (Books) and
  • Dansk periodicafortegnelse (Serials)

The weekly issues are in PDF format.

p>To access and search the database format of the Danish national bibliography see the database Danske Samlinger.

hash.name: Danske Samlinger

meta.more-info:
This allows you to limit your search to, among others, one of the following bibliographies:


  • Biblioteca Danica 1482-1840
  • Dania Polyglotta
  • Dansk tidsskrift-/-periodicafotegnelse (Danish Periodica Catalogue)

The weekly issues of two current series of Danish National Bibliography are also available online in PDF format from 2003 to the present under the titles Dansk bogfortegnelse and Dansk perio
dicalfortegnelse. You can find these titles in the NEOS catalogue or in our Library's databases list.

hash.title: Danske Samlinger
hash.databasedescription:
Select REX on the library's homepage, then select the Nationalbiblioteket (National library) from the top menu. This will display the Nationalbibliotekets Samlingen (Collections of the National Library) where you can choose Danske Samlinger (Danish Collection), or select one of the sub-collections listed under National- og Fagbibliografier' (National and Subject Bibliographies) .
This allows you to limit your search to, among others, one of the following bibliographies:


  • Biblioteca Danica 1482-1840
  • Dania Polyglotta
  • Dansk tidsskrift-/-periodicafotegnelse (Danish Periodica Catalogue)

The weekly issues of two current series of Danish National Bibliography are also available online in PDF format from 2003 to the present under the titles Dansk bogfortegnelse and Dansk perio
dicalfortegnelse. You can find these titles in the NEOS catalogue or in our Library's databases list.

hash.name: Deutsche Biographie
hash.title: Deutsche Biographie
hash.databasedescription: Searchable biographical database of 90,000 Germanic individuals, from the Middle Ages to the present, in all sectors of the public, scientific, economic and cultural life. Allgemeine deutsche Biographie (ADB) contains the digitized print edition (55 volumes and index, 1875-1912, Fraktur typeface). Neue deutsche Biographie (NDB) contains citations only, no full text, for its 23 volumes, 1953-present.

hash.name: Deutsche Nationalbibliografie Online
hash.title: Deutsche Nationalbibliografie Online
hash.databasedescription: The Deutsche Nationalbibliografie Online is a database version of the German national bibliography. It includes all publications issued in Germany as well as publications of German authors published in another country.

hash.name: Handrit.is
hash.title: Handrit.is
hash.databasedescription: Handrit.is provides access to digitized Islandic historical manuscripts dating back hundreds of years. The interface is available in English, Icelandic, and Danish.

hash.name: Icelandic National Bibliography
hash.title: Icelandic National Bibliography
hash.databasedescription: Gegnir provides access to the National Bibliography of Iceland. In the advanced search mode, use the code WYR=[year] to limit search to works published during a specific year. Interface is available in Icelandic and English

hash.name: nederlandse bibliografie
hash.title: nederlandse bibliografie
hash.databasedescription: 'NetUit'(Netherlands Bibliography Weeklist, or Nederlandse bibliografie weeklijst) consists of the A-list, the B-list and the C-list of the Netherlands Bibliography since 2002. The six most recent issues are available directly. Click "download" to access previous issues.

hash.name: Norwegian national bibliography (Norbok)

meta.more-info: Complete coverage from 1921 (Norwegian publications) and 1978 (foreign publications) - but la large number of older publications are included. The oldest print published in Norway is dated 1643, the oldest published abroad 1540. Registration of documents published in Norway is based on legal deposit; literature published abroad is registered to the extent that it is located.

hash.title: Norwegian national bibliography (Norbok)
hash.databasedescription:
Provides access to the National Bibliography of Norway in a database format. Includes references to books, pamphlets, serial monographs, maps, electronic documents (including e-books), talking books (1992-) published in Norway in any language. Original works by Norwegian citizens published abroad and reports published abroad from conferences held in Norway. From 1978 also foreign translations of documents by Norwegian citizens and foreigners' works about Norway and Norwegian affairs.
Complete coverage from 1921 (Norwegian publications) and 1978 (foreign publications) - but la large number of older publications are included. The oldest print published in Norway is dated 1643, the oldest published abroad 1540. Registration of documents published in Norway is based on legal deposit; literature published abroad is registered to the extent that it is located.

hash.name: Swedish National Bibliographies

meta.more-info:
It includes:
  • The National Bibliography - Monographs = Nationalbibliografin - Böcker
  • The National Bibliography - Periodicals = Nationalbibliografin – Tidskrifter
  • Nya Lundstedt - Periodicals (1900-) = Nya Lundstedt - Tidskrifter
  • The Swedish bibliography - the 17th century (Collijn) = Svensk bibliografi, 1600-talet (Collijn)
  • The Swedish Bibliography 1700-1829 (SB17) = Svensk bibliografi 1700-1829 (SB17)
  • The Swedish Public Print -1833 (SOT) = Svenskt offentligt tryck -1833 (SOT)

To access a specific database, scroll down the page past the listing of subject-specialized databases until you reach Swedish National bibliographies, then select desired title.

hash.title: Swedish National Bibliographies
hash.databasedescription:
Provides access to a number of databases that constitute the current and retrospective Swedish National Bibliography
It includes:
  • The National Bibliography - Monographs = Nationalbibliografin - Böcker
  • The National Bibliography - Periodicals = Nationalbibliografin – Tidskrifter
  • Nya Lundstedt - Periodicals (1900-) = Nya Lundstedt - Tidskrifter
  • The Swedish bibliography - the 17th century (Collijn) = Svensk bibliografi, 1600-talet (Collijn)
  • The Swedish Bibliography 1700-1829 (SB17) = Svensk bibliografi 1700-1829 (SB17)
  • The Swedish Public Print -1833 (SOT) = Svenskt offentligt tryck -1833 (SOT)

To access a specific database, scroll down the page past the listing of subject-specialized databases until you reach Swedish National bibliographies, then select desired title.

hash.name: The Swiss Book : Swiss National Bibliography
hash.title: The Swiss Book : Swiss National Bibliography
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the online version of the bibliographic records of the Swiss National Bibliography from 2001 to the present.

hash.name: Österreichische Historische Bibliographie (ÖHB)
hash.title: Österreichische Historische Bibliographie (ÖHB)
hash.databasedescription: The ÖHB (Austrian Historical Bibliography) is a bibliography of historical literature published in Austrian books, periodicals, Festschriften and dissertations since 1945. It includes primarily Austrian history, as well as the history of other countries and nations.

hash.name: Database of Promoting Health Effectiveness Reviews
hash.title: Database of Promoting Health Effectiveness Reviews
hash.databasedescription: A register of health promotion reviews, updated quarterly.

hash.name: EPPI-Centre Evidence Library
hash.title: EPPI-Centre Evidence Library
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the systematic reviews and knowledge pages produced by the Evidence for Policy and Practice Information and Co-ordinating Centre (EPPI-Centre) of the Social Science Research Unit at the Institute of Education, University of London.

hash.name: Annual Reviews
hash.title: Annual Reviews
hash.databasedescription: Full-text of the Annual Reviews journals.

hash.name: Health Policy Reference Center

meta.more-info: Provides full-text coverage of information relevant to many areas of health policy including: health care access, health care quality, and health care financing.

hash.title: Health Policy Reference Center
hash.databasedescription:
Provides full-text coverage of information relevant to many areas of health policy including: health care access, health care quality, and health care financing.
Provides full-text coverage of information relevant to many areas of health policy including: health care access, health care quality, and health care financing.

hash.name: HealthSTAR

meta.more-info: Topics covered include: health economics; financial and personnel administration in the health sector; quality assurance and assessment; material management in health institutions; health policy; health services planning; evaluation of patient outcomes; effectiveness of procedures, programs, products and processes.The coverage is international (including Canadian material), but the U.S. literature is given the most coverage.

hash.title: HealthSTAR
hash.databasedescription:
HealthSTAR (1975 to the present) covers an international range of journals, books, book chapters and technical reports in the areas of health services and hospital administration, and health technology assessment.
Topics covered include: health economics; financial and personnel administration in the health sector; quality assurance and assessment; material management in health institutions; health policy; health services planning; evaluation of patient outcomes; effectiveness of procedures, programs, products and processes.The coverage is international (including Canadian material), but the U.S. literature is given the most coverage.

hash.name: International Digest of Health Legislation
hash.title: International Digest of Health Legislation
hash.databasedescription: Contains a selection of national and international health legislation. Texts of legislation are summarized in English or mentioned by their title. Where possible, links are provided to other websites that contain full texts of the legislation in question.

hash.name: Quebec Population Health Research Network
hash.title: Quebec Population Health Research Network
hash.databasedescription: Contains documents on knowledge utilization, innovation & smart practices, and policy & management of health services.

hash.name: Index Catalogue of the Library of the Surgeon-General's Office
hash.title: Index Catalogue of the Library of the Surgeon-General's Office
hash.databasedescription: Covering more than 100 of the organic chemistry journals, Index Chemicus is text- and substructure-searchable, and offers full graphical summaries, important reaction diagrams, and complete bibliographic information.

hash.name: AccessUN

meta.more-info:
Masthead documents (mimeos), Official Records, sales publications, limited and restricted documents, sessional and standing committee documents, functional commissions, conferences and regional bodies are the basis of the Index. Articles appearing in UN periodicals, and bilateral and multilateral treaties in the UN Treaty Series are also indexed.

Full-text resolutions from the General Assembly, Security Council and the Economic and Social Council are appended to their respective bibliographic citations. Also, selected Provisional Verbatim and Summary Records documents,
which contain voting records of General Assembly and Security Council resolutions, are added to the database in reverse chronological order (1990-onward).

The Index supports access to the microfiche and paper formats of the University of Alberta's United Nations holdings. The "Readex Year" field readily identifies documents included in the Readex microfiche collection.

Including McClatchey Tribune titles

hash.title: AccessUN
hash.databasedescription:
AccessUN is the online version of the Index to United Nations Documents and Publications. This index provides access to current and retrospective United Nations documents and publications from the six main bodies of the United Nations - General Assembly, Security Council, Economic and Social Council, Trusteeship Council, Secretariat and International Court of Justice .

Masthead documents (mimeos), Official Records, sales publications, limited and restricted documents, sessional and standing committee documents, functional commissions, conferences and regional bodies are the basis of the Index. Articles appearing in UN periodicals, and bilateral and multilateral treaties in the UN Treaty Series are also indexed.

Full-text resolutions from the General Assembly, Security Council and the Economic and Social Council are appended to their respective bibliographic citations. Also, selected Provisional Verbatim and Summary Records documents,
which contain voting records of General Assembly and Security Council resolutions, are added to the database in reverse chronological order (1990-onward).

The Index supports access to the microfiche and paper formats of the University of Alberta's United Nations holdings. The "Readex Year" field readily identifies documents included in the Readex microfiche collection.

Including McClatchey Tribune titles

hash.name: Chicano Database
hash.title: Chicano Database
hash.databasedescription: The Chicano Database indexes all types of material for information about Mexican-American topics, and is the only specialized database for and about Chicanos. Updated quarterly, the Chicano Database provides extensive coverage from the 1960s to the present, with selective coverage dating back to the early 1900s. Records added since 1992 have expanded its scope to include the broader Latino experience, including Puerto Ricans, Cuban Americans, and Central American immigrants.

hash.name: Digital National Security Archive
hash.title: Digital National Security Archive
hash.databasedescription: Created in collaboration with the National Security Archive, this database is the most comprehensive collection available of significant primary documents central to U.S. foreign and military policy since 1945.

hash.name: Europa World Plus
hash.title: Europa World Plus
hash.databasedescription: Europa World Plus is the online version of the Europa World Year Book and the nine-volume Europa Regional Surveys of the World series.

hash.name: Regesta Imperii
hash.title: Regesta Imperii
hash.databasedescription: Provides access to the online version of Regesta imperii (in form of page images as well as full-text) and related databases, a searchable online index of primary and secondary literature in the area of medieval European studies, and links to online resources in medieval history.

hash.name: Rulers
hash.title: Rulers
hash.databasedescription: This site contains lists of heads of state and heads of government (and, in certain cases, de facto leaders not occupying either of those formal positions) of all countries and territories, going back to about 1700 in most cases. Also included are the subdivisions of various countries (the links are at the bottom of the respective country entries), as well as a selection of international organizations.

hash.name: SAGE Research Methods
hash.title: SAGE Research Methods
hash.databasedescription: SAGE Research Methods is a web-based research methods tool that covers quantitative, qualitative and mixed methods. Researchers can explore methods and concepts to help design research projects, understand a particular method or identify a new method, and write up research. Sage Research Methods focuses on methodology rather than disciplines, and is of potential use to researchers from the social sciences, health sciences and other research areas.

hash.name: The First World War
hash.title: The First World War
hash.databasedescription: Contains digitized documents relating to the firsthand experience of the First World War. Primary source material includes digital images of diaries, letters, personal narratives, trench journals, scrapbooks, objects, and visual sources. Secondary resources include interactive maps, 360° panoramas and walk-throughs, scholarly essays, a slideshow gallery, chronology and glossaries.

hash.name: The Gerritsen Collection - Women's History Online
hash.title: The Gerritsen Collection - Women's History Online
hash.databasedescription: Contains the full-text of more than 4,700 publications on feminist issues dating from 1543-1945. Content is from continental Europe, the U.S., the United Kingdom, Canada, and New Zealand.

hash.name: The Making of Modern Law: Primary Sources, 1620-1970 Digital Archive
hash.title: The Making of Modern Law: Primary Sources, 1620-1970 Digital Archive
hash.databasedescription:
Part I (1620-1926) is based primarily on holdings of the Lillian Goldman Law Library at Yale University, this product offers online access to early state codes, city charters, documents relating to constitutional conventions, and other resources in American legal history.

Part II (1763-1979) includes material from the Harvard Law School Library, the Yale Law Library, and the Law Library of Congress, and offers online access to United States codes, constitutional conventions and compilations, and municipal codes, Part II enhances scholarly access to essential documents in American legal history.

hash.name: Women, War and Society, 1914-1918
hash.title: Women, War and Society, 1914-1918
