hash.databasedescription: The database provides access to information about Basque topics written or produced after 1994.Core journals are indexed completely while other journal articles appear in the database when they fit the scope of database. Formats included are articles, books, chapters of edited books, dissertations and other publications;Basque-related videos and DVDs, musical recordings, maps, and other media. Whenever permission has been obtained, database includes full text of articles and papers.

hash.name: Bibliografía chilena
hash.title: Bibliografía chilena

hash.name: Bibliografía española en línea

meta.more-info: Science and technology doctoral dissertations are also part of the bibliography. - Periodicals: includes paper, microform and electronic titles deposited since 2006. Excludes conference reports and monographic series. The list is updated three times per year. - Maps: except atlases (see monographs), since 2006 - Print music: annual updates, since 2005

hash.title: Bibliografía española en línea
hash.databasedescription:
The online national Spanish bibliography provides access to Spain's publication output in the formats listed below. Titles listed in the bibliography have been deposited at the National Library of Spain. It is possible to search titles in each format separately. - Monographs: contains monographs published since january 2007. It does not include elementary school texts, while those for secondary education are listed.
Science and technology doctoral dissertations are also part of the bibliography. - Periodicals: includes paper, microform and electronic titles deposited since 2006. Excludes conference reports and monographic series. The list is updated three times per year. - Maps: except atlases (see monographs), since 2006 - Print music: annual updates, since 2005

hash.name: Bibliografia Mexicana
hash.title: Bibliografia Mexicana
hash.databasedescription: The Bibliografía mexicana is a compilation of the bibliographical records describing Mexico's publication output received by the Biblioteca Nacional on legal deposit.

hash.name: Bibliografía nacional (Uruguay)
hash.title: Bibliografía nacional (Uruguay)
hash.databasedescription: The online national bibliography contains books, pamphlets and periodicals printed in Uruguay, since 1990 to 2008. Works published abroad by uruguayan authors, and works by foreigners who refer to Uruguay are also included. There will be retrospective actualizations.

hash.name: Bibliografia Nacional Portuguesa
hash.title: Bibliografia Nacional Portuguesa
hash.databasedescription: The Portuguese National Bibliography online contains monographic works, including theses and other academic research, and serial publications that were placed in the National Library as part of legal deposit. It covers titles published since 1935.

hash.name: Biblioteca Digital de Teses e Dissertaçoes
hash.title: Biblioteca Digital de Teses e Dissertaçoes
hash.databasedescription:
Theses and Dissertations of 18 Brazilian universities and libraries are available on-line at the IBICT site Biblioteca Digital de Teses e
Dissertações.

hash.name: Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes
hash.title: Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes
hash.databasedescription: La Biblioteca virtual gives online access to Spanish language digitized texts and periodicals, as well as criticism and thematic information. There is also access to online videos and sound recordings.

hash.name: Citações e alusões na ficção de Machado de Assis
hash.title: Citações e alusões na ficção de Machado de Assis
hash.databasedescription: This database facilitates searching quotations and historical and literary references in the novels and short stories of Machado de Assis. It is possible to find here cited authors, works cited, historical facts, fictional or historical characters, and place names. One can also find references to anonymous works (e.g. proverbs, adages...) or collective works (e.g. Bible, classical mythology, or history in general).

hash.name: Índice alfabético de Personajes
hash.title: Índice alfabético de Personajes
hash.databasedescription: This biographical database gives brief biographical information for more than 50 thousand Spanish figures throughout Spain's history as they appear in the Diccionario biográfico español. The data for each entry relates to dates of birth and death, places and geographical regions of birth and death, and profession(s).

hash.name: Multibase - Catálogo de Libros
hash.title: Multibase - Catálogo de Libros
hash.databasedescription: Union Catalog for Mexican Libraries

hash.name: Real academia española
hash.title: Real academia española
hash.databasedescription:
This website gives access to a number of online Spanish reference resources authored by the Real academia espaï¿½ola.




  1. Diccionario de la lengua espaï¿½ola
  2. Consultas linguï¿½sticas
  3. Nuevo tesoro lexicogrï¿½fico de la lengua espaï¿½ola
  4. Ortografï¿½a de la lengua espaï¿½ola

hash.name: RiLVi: Repertorio Integrado de Libro en Venta en IberoAmÃ©rica
hash.title: RiLVi: Repertorio Integrado de Libro en Venta en IberoAmÃ©rica
hash.databasedescription: RiLVi gives detailed and complete bibliographical information for Iberoamerica's books in print.

hash.name: SciELO: Scientific Electronic Library Online
hash.title: SciELO: Scientific Electronic Library Online
hash.databasedescription: SciELO is an electronic library that gives full-text access to a collection of scientific journals from Brazil, Chile, Cuba, and Spain.

hash.name: Teatro Español del Siglo de Oro
hash.title: Teatro Español del Siglo de Oro
hash.databasedescription: Contains the most important dramatic works of sixteenth and seventeenth century Spain, including more than 800 plays written by 16 dramatists.

hash.name: Tesis Doctorals en Xarxa (TDX)
hash.title: Tesis Doctorals en Xarxa (TDX)
hash.databasedescription: TDX is a searchable full-text database of Doctoral theses published in Catalonian universities (Spain). The documents are indexed in Catalan, but the full-text is often in Spanish. Subject headings are searchable and are based on the Universal Decimal Classification.

hash.name: The Life and Times of Jorge Luis Borges
hash.title: The Life and Times of Jorge Luis Borges
hash.databasedescription: Originates from the Jorge Luis Borges Collection and Documentation Center of the Fundación San Telmo, which contains the world's largest collection of materials related to Borges' life and works. The collection was begun in 1986 and includes manuscripts and letters, books, periodicals, photographs, audio and video recordings, newspaper and magazine clippings, and other objects and documents.

hash.name: Traces: Base de dades de llengua i literatura catalanes
hash.title: Traces: Base de dades de llengua i literatura catalanes
hash.databasedescription: TRACES is a bibliographical data base on Catalan language and literature. TRACES project born on 1987 by the Grup d'Estudis de Literatura Catalana Contemporània (GELCC) from the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona.

hash.name: Encyclopedia of Spectroscopy and Spectrometry
hash.title: Encyclopedia of Spectroscopy and Spectrometry
hash.databasedescription: Covers current knowledge in the field of spectroscopy and related areas. Subjects such as mass spectrometry and scattering phenomena utilise many principles of spectroscopy and are so closely related in the perception of the user that the are included in the work.

hash.name: Canadian Centre for Justice Statistics
hash.title: Canadian Centre for Justice Statistics
hash.databasedescription:
Contains electronic data tables illustrating current and historical data from a number of Statistics Canada surveys. The database shows data on crime, police administration, adult and youth court activity, the correctional population and transition homes, as well as various issues such as criminal victimization and family violence.


Also, try searching for Canadian Centre for Justice Statistics publications in the library catalogue.

hash.name: EU KLEMS Project
hash.title: EU KLEMS Project
hash.databasedescription: Database on measures of economic growth, productivity, employment creation, capital formation and technological change at the industry level for all European Union member states from 1970 onwards.

hash.name: Hydrometric Station Reference Index
hash.title: Hydrometric Station Reference Index
hash.databasedescription: This online Index is a tabulation of stations showing station number and name, drainage area, gauge location, discharge records, type of gauge, operation schedule, and remarks. The names of rivers and lakes for which data are available are given in a station number index and an alphabetical index at the end of the tabulation.

hash.name: MIL Statistics Data
hash.title: MIL Statistics Data
hash.databasedescription: MIL Statistics Data provides access to Global FactLab, which provides statistics on current events from the World Bank, UN, SCB, Eurostat among others.

hash.name: Profile of Edmonton Neighbourhoods, 1996
hash.title: Profile of Edmonton Neighbourhoods, 1996
hash.databasedescription: 1996 Census Statistics by Edmonton neighbourhood from "Alberta Avenue" to "Weir Industrial".

hash.name: Summary Tables (Canadian Statistics)
hash.title: Summary Tables (Canadian Statistics)
hash.databasedescription: A portal to Statistics Canada tables at higher levels of geography (Canada, provinces & territories, some large urban areas), which reflect recent trends in "The Economy", "The Land" (agriculture, geography, environment), "The People" (demographics, health, labour, etc.), and "The State".

hash.name: Canadian Financial Markets Research Center
hash.title: Canadian Financial Markets Research Center
hash.databasedescription: Contains Toronto Stock Exchange data (prices, returns, volume, etc. for Canadian common and preferred equities).

hash.name: CRSP (Center for Research in Security Prices) Database

meta.more-info:
The month-end data begins in December 1925 for NYSE. The end-of-day data begins in
1962 for NYSE and AMEX and 1972 for Nasdaq. CRSP (the Center for Research in
Security Prices) maintains the most comprehensive and accurate databases of
standard and derived historical data for NYSE, AMEX and Nasdaq common stocks. It
is maintained by the University of Chicago Graduate School of Business

hash.title: CRSP (Center for Research in Security Prices) Database
hash.databasedescription:
The CRSP Database provides access to NYSE/AMEX/Nasdaq Daily and Monthly Security Prices and other historical data related to over 20,000 companies.
The month-end data begins in December 1925 for NYSE. The end-of-day data begins in
1962 for NYSE and AMEX and 1972 for Nasdaq. CRSP (the Center for Research in
Security Prices) maintains the most comprehensive and accurate databases of
standard and derived historical data for NYSE, AMEX and Nasdaq common stocks. It
is maintained by the University of Chicago Graduate School of Business

hash.name: CRSP Mutual Fund Database

meta.more-info: Additionally, schedules of rear and front load fees, asset class codes, and management company contact information are provided. All data items are for publicly traded open-end mutual funds (active and inactive) and begin at varying times between 1962 and 2008 depending on availability. The database is updated quarterly and distributed with a monthly lag.

hash.title: CRSP Mutual Fund Database
hash.databasedescription:
The CRSP Survivor-Bias-Free US Mutual Fund Database includes a history of each mutual fund's name, investment style, fee structure, holdings, and asset allocation. Also included are monthly total returns, monthly total net assets, monthly/daily net asset values, and dividends.
Additionally, schedules of rear and front load fees, asset class codes, and management company contact information are provided. All data items are for publicly traded open-end mutual funds (active and inactive) and begin at varying times between 1962 and 2008 depending on availability. The database is updated quarterly and distributed with a monthly lag.

hash.name: TAQ (Trade and Quote)
hash.title: TAQ (Trade and Quote)
hash.databasedescription: Contains intraday transactions data (trades and quotes) for all NYSE, AMEX, NASDAQ and Small Cap issues.

hash.name: ASERNIP NET-s Database (Australian Safety and Efficacy Register of New Interventional Procedures - Surgical)
hash.title: ASERNIP NET-s Database (Australian Safety and Efficacy Register of New Interventional Procedures - Surgical)
hash.databasedescription: Provides reviews of surgical techniques and technologies.

hash.name: BiblioNet: Cent classiques de la littérature française
hash.title: BiblioNet: Cent classiques de la littérature française
hash.databasedescription: BiblioNet: Cent classiques de la littérature française is a database of over a hundred classical French texts including the works of authors such as Balzac, Flaubert, and Zola. Texts range in date from 1100 to 1923.

hash.name: UNESDOC
hash.title: UNESDOC
hash.databasedescription: The UNESDOC database contains the full text and bibliographic records of documents and publications published by UNESCO since 1945 as well as bibliographic records of library acquisitions. These documents and publications are produced by UNESCO Offices and Institutes and cover all areas of its activities: education, natural sciences, social and human sciences, culture, communication and information.

hash.name: Blackwell Reference Online
hash.title: Blackwell Reference Online
hash.databasedescription: Collection of reference monographs published by Blackwell in the areas of humanities and social sciences.

hash.name: Digital Book Index
hash.title: Digital Book Index
hash.databasedescription: Lists over 60,000 fiction and nonfiction e-books from over 1,800 commercial and non-commercial publishers. Many categories of books are listed, including reference, history, children's, and African American studies. Titles may be free, available by subscription, or for purchase. Also links to e-book reader software.

hash.name: World Book Academic
hash.title: World Book Academic
